1Mi ɛeddan tlata wussan segmi yuɣal d lḥakem, Fistus yuli si temdint n Qiṣarya ɣer temdint n Lquds.
2Dɣa lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d imeqqranen n wat Isṛail, ccetkan ɣuṛ-es ɣef Bulus.
3Ssutren i Fistus a sen-ixdem lemziya, a sen-d-yawi Bulus ɣer temdint n Lquds, nutni heggan-as-d taxazabit iwakken a t-nɣen deg webrid.
4Lameɛna Fistus yerra-yasen : Bulus ițwaḥbes di Qiṣarya, nekk s yiman-iw qṛib ad uɣaleɣ ɣer dinna.
5Xtiṛet-ed si gar-awen wid ara yeddun yid-i ; ma yella kra n wayen n diri i gexdem
... (1054 chars skipped) ... 
zdat Qayṣer !
13Mi ɛeddan kra wussan, agellid Aɣribas akk-d weltma-s Birinis, usan-d ɣer Qiṣarya ad sellmen ɣef lḥakem Fistus.
14Imi qqimen dinna kra wussan, Fistus iḥka-yas i ugellid-nni taqsiṭ n Bulus, yenna-yas : Yella yiwen wergaz i geǧǧa Filiks dagi d ameḥbus.
15Mi lliɣ di temdint n Lquds, ccetkan fell-as imeqqranen n lmuqedmin d lɛuqal n wat Isṛail ; ssutren-iyi-d ad ḥekmeɣ fell-as.
16Nniɣ-asen mačči di lɛadda n iṛumaniyen ad ḥekmen ɣef wemdan uqbel a t-semqabalen nețța d wid i d-iccetkan 
... (1054 chars skipped) ...
 dagi ; țɛeggiḍen qqaṛen : « ilaq ad immet »!
25Ma d nekk, idheṛ-iyi-d lḥal ur ixdim ula d acemma yuklalen lmut ; imi nețța s yiman-is yerẓa ccṛeɛ ɣer Qayṣer, qebleɣ a s-t-ceggɛeɣ.
26Ur ufiɣ ula d yiwet n sebba iseḥḥan i ɣef ara ketbeɣ fell-as i Qayṣer ; daymi i t-id-sbeddeɣ zdat wen, ula zdat-ek ay agellid Aɣribas, iwakken m'ara t-beḥten ad yili wayen ara ketbeɣ fell-as.
27Axaṭer walaɣ mačči d ṣṣwab ma ceggɛeɣ yiwen umeḥbus ɣer temdint n Ṛuma mbla ma fkiɣ-asen sebba s wayes i d ccetkan fell-as.

Aix-en-Provence
Aix-en-Provence d tamdint n Fransa, tezga-d deg wenẓul n tmurt, deg agezdu n Bouches-du-Rhône. Zedɣen-tt 143,404 n yimezdaɣen.
Tamdint-a tella deg-s tesdawit. Tettili-d deg-s tfaska n uẓawan (lmuziga) mechurent. Aix-en-Provence tesɛa daɣen aḥemmam, am wakken ay llant deg-s lluzinat n yifarisen n tuccit. Takatidṛalt n Saint-Sauveur ay d-yezgan deg-s, tettwabna deg lqern wis 11. Tamdint-a tesɛa isensa d iqburen, ttwabnan gar lqern wis 17 ed wis 18, am wakken ay llan deg-s yisalayen. D Irruman ay d-yesbedden tamdint-a deg useggas n 123 qbel Sidna Ɛisa, yerna llan ɣɣaren-as Aquae Sextiae. Deg useggas n 102 qbel Sidna Ɛisa, yella-d, deg tama n temdint-a, yessaweḍ ujiniral aruman Marius, ad yernu Ituṭunen ay d-iẓedmen ɣef Gall.

Deg tnewwalt n leqbayel
Aɣrum n uzumbil
Isufar
- 275 g n lfarina
- 100 ml n waman
- 75 ml n uyefki
- 10 cl n zzit
- 1 n tcelwiḍt n yiɣes n lkuca
- 1 n tɣenjawt n lmakla
n ssker n uwren
- 2 n lkumcat n yiɛeqqayen n uzumbil
- 1 n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n lmelḥ
Aheggi
Qlut-d iɛeqqayen-nni n uzumbil daxel n tmeqqlit mebla zzit neɣ udi. Sxelḍet daxel n lḥila aman, ayefki, zzit, ssker, iɣes n lkuca akked yiɛeqqayen n uzumbil, tanfem-as ad yali azal n 1h30’. Suzret-as i urekti-nni lfarina, tmesslem-d 6 n takurin, tanfem-asent diɣ ad alint azal n 30’. Seḥmut lkuca 200, terrem aɣrum ad wwent azal n 25’. Sufffet-t-id, tanfem-as ad yismiḍ. S tezmert-nwen.

Firefox
Lqem ummid n Firefox, yesɛan isefran n wagan akked timahilin n uqadeṛ n tudert tusligt, yewweḍ-d ar izirazen akken tifelwiyin n uselkem.
Sync
iOS & AndroidSebded Firefox ɣef yibenkan-ik i tunigin s war aneḥbus.
- Anekcum fessusen ɣer ticraḍ-ik n isebtar i tḥemmleḍ, awalen-ik uffiren yettwaskelsen, amazray-ik d wayen-nniḍen.
- Tawuri n tuzna n waccaren ad k-teǧǧ ad tebḍuḍ s wudem fessusen accaren yeldin ɣef uziraz-ik akked uselkim-ik.
Tabaḍnit
iOS & AndroidQim d aqerru ɣef wayen akk i tbeṭṭuḍ srid s useqdec n tunigin tusligt, s useqdec n ummesten mgal aḍfaṛ.
- Yessewḥal adellel i k-yeṭṭafaren anda ma teddiḍ di Internet.
Ammesten usliɣ mgal aḍfar akked tebdarin n usewḥel i d-ifka Disconnect.
Isiɣzaf & waggan
Android kanAxiṛ émoji neɣ tiffursa ? Err Firefox d udmawan akken tebɣiḍ.
- Isiɣzaf Fren seg wagimen n yifecka am yimsewḥal n udellel, ifecka n tvidyutin neɣ imsefraken n wawalen uffiren.
- Isental Err Firefox ad yeddu akken tḥemmleḍ. Fren asentel amaynut si taggayin-nneɣ neɣ rnu win-ik.

Amgaru Anmaḍal Wis Sin (Takussna):
Amgaru Anmaḍal Wis Sin d amyenkaf anmaḍal i yeqqimen seg 1939 ɣer 1945. Amur ameqqran seg tmura n umaḍal, gar-
... (2428 chars skipped) ... 
s-nnes, twet akken ad teɣmer Asya Tagmuḍant d Ugaraw Amelwi. Amgaru-nnes d Ccinwa yella yebda-d yakan deg 1937. Deg Dujembeṛ n 1941, Japun tenṭeg igelluyen imarikaniyen d yibriṭaniyen ɣef tikkelt deg Asya n Unẓul-Agmuḍan d Ugaraw Amelwi yernu yiwen seg yigelluyen iɣef tenṭeg d Pearl Harbor deg tegzirin n Hawaii. D aya i yeǧǧan Iwanaken Yeddukklen d Tgelda Yeddukklen ad d-sgurint amgaru mgal Japun. Ilmend n temsetlelt d Japun, timura n Ugellus n Tuṛuft (Lalman d Ṭṭalyan s umata) sgurint-d amgaru 
... (2428 chars skipped) ...
in timeqqranin n Tuṛuft uɣalent d tuḍɛifin ɣef lǧal n usnegzu i yekkan fell-asent deg Umgaru Anmaḍal Wis Sin. D aya i tent-yeǧǧan ur zemmrent ara ad kemmlent ad jemɛent tihras-nsent deg Tefriqt d Asya yernu terra-tent tmara ad asent-fken azarug. D aya umi semman "tukksa n usehres." Amur ameqqran seg tmura umi tedrem temguri deg umgaru-nni ulsent ṣkent-d timguriwin-nsent yernu smeɣrent-tent.

Aselway n tegduda « yesbeḍ-d amenḍar n sin n wayyuren, ma aṭas, i tuddma n wakk akaten yessefken i uciri n tidet n yimahilen n tmeṣkiwt n usagen asnuddsan n Lḥemdaniyya deg Cercal », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna yiwen n ulɣu n tselwit n tegduda.
Deg wayen yerzan imahilen inagduden, Mass Tebboune yumeṛ ad ssifessen azlay abridan seg d ɣer Lezzayer Tamaneɣt s ucegger n uɣawas n uzlay d usejhed n uẓeḍwu n yibriden imazzalen d yisenfalen.
Yumeṛ daɣ s uheyyi n umetwi n useḥbiber mgal usexṣer n yidrimen ɣef lǧal n uɛeḍḍel ay ttɛeḍḍilen yiɣerruba deg yisugan-nneɣ.

Tigzirt akked UẒeffun - Ussan n useɛlem mgal lehyuf
D tiddukkla timettit “Tameṭṭut iqeddcen” ara d-yellin i lmendad
Texdem ass-nni n larebɛa 1/8/2018, tiddukkla timettit “Tameṭṭut iqeddcen” n Tizi Uzzu, yiwet n temlilit n tɣamsa deg uxxam n tiddukkla, yellan deg tlemmast n temdint n Tizi Uzzu.
D tagnit i textar tselwayt n tiddukkla-agi massa Hachemi Djouher, i wakken ad d-tefk ugar n yisallen ɣef wahil n tsemhuyt-agi n tmerrit. Dɣa ɣef tegnatin i tettidir u
... (405 chars skipped) ... 
ddukklen yiɣallen i wakken ad tifsus teɛkumt fell-aɣ”. Syin akkin tmeslay-d ɣef wahil n 10 wussan n useɛlem mgal timsal-agi i d-nebder yakkan, i d-thegga i wussan-agi sdat-nneɣ. Dɣa tberreḥ-d s waya: “ Deg wahil-nneɣ unṣib, niqal njerred 15 n wussan, acu kan imi tadrimt ur d-tettqad ara, dɣa nsenɣes 5 n wussan”. Ussan-agi n useɛlem, bdan iḍelli n lḥed 05/08/2018 ad kemmlen alamma d ass n ttlata 14 ɣuct 2018. D tiftisin n Tegzirt d Uẓeffun akked usagen (port) ara yilin di ttiɛad, am wakken daɣen 
... (405 chars skipped) ...
emḍart n lehyuf di tmetti. Ad yili diɣ uskan n tedwilin i texdem tiddukkla seg wasmi tebda di 2012 ɣef ddemma n wannect-agi. D imeǧǧayen n tiklisent (psycholoques), yecban mass Rachid Belkhir akked mass Adaoun Yacine, ara d-yilin ɣef yisaragen imeẓyanen i yimerriyen ara d-yerzun yal ass ɣer teftisin-agi. Ad fersen daɣen tagnit yimsuddsen-agi, i wakken ad fken tameẓẓuɣt i yimdanen yebɣan ad ḥkun tiremt-nsen, wa ad d-rren ɣef yisteqsiyen n yimdanen-agi ara ten-id-yesteqsin ɣef kra n temsalt.
Gh. A

D tanaɣit, d tanaɣit waha, anict i yemɣer Arif, yemɣer‑aneɣ deg wul kṭer. Yemɣer al mani yedwel wul‑nneɣ wer izemmer ad t‑yeksi. Wer izemmer a zzag‑s t‑nekkes. Amnus d wenni waha lebda, amnus n Urifi, wer yecqi iḥedd mani ittili. Inni ixelqen di Dyaspura dag‑sen amnus ad ssnen Arif‑nsen mamek yegga, ttweḥḥcen‑t, itteffeɣ‑dd dag‑sen mkul anebdu. Waxxa wer ten‑yeqqin aked tmurt‑a ɣir idammen, d cwayt n Tmaziɣt terreẓ.
Inni di Arif dag‑sen amnus n mamek zzag‑s ɣa ffɣen, manis ɣa kken, cḥal yegga we
... (775 chars skipped) ... 
seɣ‑tt. Aqesses‑nni, dwenni i ittejjan Irifiyyen n barra, mkul aseggʷas ad ɛelfen ɣer Arif. Yella-d, ussan iɛeddan, usizdeg n teftist talemmast n temdint n Tegzirt.
Imi tezdeg n twennaḍt tesɛa azal d ameqqran, i tdawsa n umdan akked tdawsa n wakal s timad-is, ihi ɣef waya, i d-ttnekkaren s tebɣest tameqqrant yiɛeggalen n tddukkliwin-agi, u ssawalen-d di yal tama n tmurt i yimdanen, ladɣa deg ussan n ustaɛfu, neɣ ɛad deg tegnit-agi n ukman n bessif, i wakken ad ffɣen ɣer tukksa n yiḍumman i d-yezzin i tnezduɣin-nsen neɣ ammus i yettmenḍaren deg yal tama n tmurt. lla-d ttesriḥ s teɣtes yeṭṭef lwali Maḥmud Ǧamɛa. Aya, yedda-d gar ttawilat n useḥbiber ɣef unfafad n Kuṛuna i yuɣen amaḍal merra. Ɣas akken tella tegdelt, maca ayagi ur yemniɛ ara iɛeggalen n tddukkla « Lions Club Tigzirt Doyen » n tɣiwant n Tegzirt i wakken ad d-ffɣen ɣer usizdeg n teftist tameqrant yellan deg tlemmast n temdint-a tinmerrit. al n 50 iqecwalen i deg ttaran iḍumman, bac ad d-yili uḍegger-nsen daxel. Iɛeggalen n tddukkla-agi, ur ssinen ara astehzi, mudden-d tamuggint i dduṛt i d-iteddun i usizdeg n teftist-nniḍen. Yacine Meghzifene.

Deg ussan-a ineggura teksi lfusina tazeggʷaɣt ij n wudem d amaynu. Udem yezdig yecna, yerra-dd buḥbel di teɣremt-a awareni ma yexleq-as ij n ueawed n usbeddi deg ijt n taynit d tameqqrant.
Tamuɣri d tmezruyant x lfusina tazeggʷaɣt
Lfusina tazeggʷaɣt, niɣ lqelea n larbeɛ n tewrirt, nettat zi lebni akulunyal i tejja Spaniya di Arrif. Lfusina tazeggʷaɣt tusa-dd di tegrawt n larbeɛ n tewrirt, tasga n Lḥusima, Arrif amerwasu.
Deg useggʷas n 1940 (timenna n David Montgomery Ha
... (1314 chars skipped) ... 
en zi wenẓar d tfuyin i teksi lfusina xef werur-nnes di leɛmer-nnes.
Deg umezwar n iseggʷasen n 2000, ad ffɣen imezdaɣ zi lfusina awarn i ma sxesren-as udem, ujar lami tdwel tessaggʷad ad zzag-s d-iwḍa ca n wezgen niɣ ca n teɣmert.
Maḥend ad neḥḍa war iweṭṭi, minzi dag-s ij n wezgen zi twengimt d umezruy n Irifiyen, ksint attas n tmesmunin di Arrif amnus n ḥettu n wayda (patrimoine) di Arrif, ig ixemmlen ict n tesnart d tamqqrant zeg umezruy-nneɣ.

« Azal n sin n wayyuren aya, wwin-iyi s tetrabt ɣer uzɣar deffir ma uḍneɣ anfafad bu uqacuc. Ass-a, ammal i Yuc, yernu s umahil n yimsujjiyen-nneɣ n usegnaf alemmas n tredsa d yimsujjiyen almaniyen, aql-iyi ttejjiɣ yernu tawala-a n temgurt tezmer ad ternu kraḍ n yimalasen akken ad d-rreɣ tadusi-inu », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna deg yiwet n teẓrit ay d-iɛeddan deg umiḍan-nnes unṣib n Twitter.
Iwekked-d uselway dakken agugu-nnes ɣef tmurt « ur yeɣs ad d-yini dakken yettu-tt », am wakken ay d-yerna dakken atan yettḍafar yal ass, asrag, asrag, akk tidyanin ay iḍerrun deg tmurt, yernu yettakf-d lewṣayat mi ara terr tmara.
Yessawel-d daɣ uselway ɣef ubrid asertan ay d-yettwanejṛen i tmurt ay d-yebder ya deg tḥemla-nnes tafranant n tselwayanin n Dujembeṛ 2019 yernu yules yesnemmer Izzayriyen imi ay t-fernen aseggas-a am wakken ay yumeṛ taselwit akken ad tfak aheyyi n usaḍuf agmanan yerzan anagraw afranan war leɛḍil neɣ seg-a ɣef 10 neɣ 15 n wussan i lmend n ubeddu n ukala asertan amaynu deg ukatar n tmenḍawt tamaynut.
Deg wayen yerzan tagnit tadawsant n tmurt aydeg yules yezreɛ waḍḍan n Covid-19, yummar uselway Tebboune s unqas ay ineqqes umḍan n tejṛa timaynutin imi ay d-yeɣli umḍan-a seg 1.300 n tejṛa deg wass ɣer wazal n 520 n tejṛa, am wakken ay yesnemmer akk wid ay yettekkan deg unqas n umḍan-a.

“Neɛya deg uraǧu !” Dɣa s wawal-a I d-usan kra n yimezdaɣ n temdint n Tubiret ɣer zdat uxxam n twilayt iwakken ad d-beggnen lɣiḍ-nsen zdat leɛḍil I d-yellan ɣef ufraq n yixxamen yettwaheggan yakan. Tasebḥit n wass l larebɛa iɛeddan, ddeqs yid-sen I d-usan, dedden iwakken ad d-jebden lwelha n yimḍebbren terza taluft. “tlatin n yiseggasen aya I ttrajuɣ melmi ara iferrej Rebbi fell-I ad sɛuɣ axxam am nekk am madden.” S waya I d-yebda awal-is yiwen n urgaz iɛeddan xemsin n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is yessarmen dakken imḍebber amezwaru n twilayt I d-yusan melmi kan ad as-yefk leḥq-is. Imdanen-a yettidiren ɣef leḥsab n yimeslayen-nsen deg yir tignatin sbabben agellel-a I uselway n tɣiwant n Tubiret d yimḍebber n Dayra I yegguman ad tt-gezmen dir ray ad fken tisura I yimdanen yuklalen ɣas akka ixxamen wejden.
Smail. M

Ddurt-agi ieeddan a$erbaz alemmas n Amyud saeid di tamdint n Tizi-Wezzu yedder yiwet n tegnitt yesbur usigna n tekrivt : sin iselmaden yettwakkes fell-asen sser, ttwaregmen, ttwawten sdaxel u$erbaz. Yiwen uselmad d anelmad-is i t-yewten s-ubeqqa zdat n-unemhal( directeur). “lemmer maççi d iselmaden id ibedden $er yidis-iw, tilli ad ttewte$ s lmus, dayen iyi-yeooan ur d ttu$ala$-ara $er u$arbaz-agi” I yenna uselmad-agi.
Sin wussan I yezrin $ef tamsalt-agi, d taselmadt nniven I yettwawven ula d nettat zdat inelmaden-is. Tagi d imarawen, n yiwet n tnelmadt I yeréan lêerma u$erbaz, imi kecmen melba tugdi $er yifer asnegman( bloc pédagogique). Dayen I yeûûawven imûulîa ad d-gren iman-nsen di tama. Di tama nniven d anemhal n ttrebga n lwilaya I irzan $er u$erbaz akken ad inadi di temsalt-agi.
Ma di t$iwant n Tmizar, di taddart n taewint, réan lherma $ef u$erbaz amenzu imi tasmeçça (cantine) tettwaker. kra n wayen yellan d tagella yettwaêweû. Ula d lbiru n-unemhal ur yemnie-ara( kra yellan din yettwezerwae).
Abdellah Arkoub

Aneɣlaf n Temguri n ddwawi, Abderrahmane Lotfi Djamel Benbahmed yesselwi alday n tedyant-a akken uneɣlaf asanigali n Tdawsa akked Yiweẓla inmettiyen, Abdoulaye Diouf Sarr, s tihawt n yigensasen tnarmin akked temṣukin n tdawsa n snat n tmura.
Yemmeslay-d i lmend n tedyant-a, yenna-d Mass Benbahmed dakken d ayen yellan d axatar deg tririt n Sanigal d « tawwurt n usmal n tifarisen izzayriyen deg temnaḍin taɛrabt akked tefriqt ».
Seg yidis-is, aneɣlaf asanigali n Tdawsa akked Yiweẓla inmettiyen izul asuddes n tmesrit tazzayrit i yettekkan deg « usetbet n wassaɣen isindisanen iǧehden » yellan gas snat n tmura.

Aɣyul n vava d jeddi, nerna rrekba deffir, ihi akka i teḍra deg yeqbayliyen ass-agi, sɣur amussu ssarmen D » Acmumeḥ », armi yuɣal d askeɛkeɛ, d taḍsa n wuglan deg wegdud i ḥeqren iman-is s yiman-is. Neẓra yakk, « Tagrawla n wecmumeḥ », tekker-d deg 16 Furar deg yeɣrem n Xeṛṛaṭa deg wul n tmurt taqbaylit, d asirem, amahat ad d-yeddu wegdud azayri afus deg fus akked wegdud aqbayli, ayen nwan waṭas n imeɣnasen yeḍra-d deg waguren imenza n tegrawla yagi.

Wannag amek ara tegziḍ neɣ ara d-sfehmeḍ, tasusmi d wesmeɛẓeg n izayriyen ɣef imeḥbas n teqbaylit ?

aɣlant.
Abdellah Benaoum, arebrab isneslem tḥesbit CNLD d ameḥbus asertan n rray, ma d Lounes Hemzi, argaz n tlelli d tsertit i yessawalen ad yuɣal wawal i wegdud tessusem fell-as.
Xas ulamma, ulac win umi nessaram lḥebs, ulac win iwatan ad yekcem ar lḥebs imi kan yesɛa tiktiwin ur ɣ-yehwin ara, maca abeddi yagi d tayett n, yessemgiriden gar wigi d wiyaḍ ɣef laǧal n tesnektit, neɣ ṛṛasa neɣ yedles neɣ tnekkit n yemdanen d miḥyaf arzagan i yilaq ad yessusef u ad d-yeggurreɛ yal ilelli, yal amdan.

Tutiya ttuɣa-tt d tameẓyant, maca deg-s tiɣit aṭṭas, walli drust.
Terra-s taynit i Lefqi n tmezyida melmi mma innuri ca n yijj, ireẓẓem xaf-s amḍel, iskuṭṭuf-s zi lekfen bac ad zeg-s igg ibexruras. Tutiya yuẓa ɣer-s wesɣad. Deg ijj n wass zeg wussan, t
... (2877 chars skipped) ... 
utiya wer tufi awal i ɣa tini, telqef-itt lɣaciyet.
wer tufi ɣir tamurt-nni itt-idd-yelqan alami tewḍa. Argaz-nni wer tt-yejji ad temmendar di lexlawat, minzi tifras-a tiɛeffanin wer ttilint deg yergazen.
Atarras-nni ixecc-dd ɣer taddart nnes :
– Arẓem deɣya tawwurt, a yelli-s n xali !

– Min yemsaren ? Manis dd-tiwyed taḥenjirt-a ?
– Ufiɣ-tt di tagant tweḍḍer, a deg-s netthilla am yelli-tneɣ, ḥuma nufa wenn yellan-nnes.

 unexliɛ d ijj n uqarṭas, ttuɣa tekfa ḥuma ad immet Lefqi .

ɛdun ussan deɣya, Lefqi wer das ibin webrid, Tutiya temɣar ɛad ujar, ibba-s d yemmas yedwel-asen-dd buḥbel. Tutiya tegga argaz-nni ittyufin d temɣart-nnes, zi wi yellan-nnes.

Anfa (Tigemmi Tamellalt)
Anfa neɣ Tigmmi Tumlilt ( s tifinaɣ : ⴰⵏⴼⴰ neɣ ⵜⵉⴳⵎⵎⵉ ⵜⵓⵎⵍⵉⵍⵜ , s tafransist d tulayin tiyaḍ : " Casablanca " , s tutlayt n taerabt: "الدار البيضاء " Al-dar Al-bayḍaa ) Iɣrem d ameqqran akw di tmurt n Umerruk, tili deg yiwen arky (3.269.962 h). Ar neqqar imezdaɣen n Anfa " Bidawa " s taerabt , d " Casawi " s darija d tamaziɣt .

Ijjen udlis d amaynu, yeggur ad yeffeɣ deg ussan-a i d-igguren n Mḥemmed Ccami yegga-as i yisem n “Ultmas n semmus n wawamaten”.
Amek d-ittban, ila adlis-a dag-s ijjen tullist, yenna x-as Mizian Rahou ila “Tullist n umari Mḥemmed Ccami tetteqqen jat tḥajit tamiwant n zik d tullist tamirayt tatrart“.
Adlis-a, yeggur ad yili d tamerniwt i tsekla tarifit, ula kter di min iqqnen ɣer wanaw n triwant.
Ccami, ila yezwar-as yessufeɣ di min yeɛdan ijjen udlis n yezlan qqaren-as “tuddimin n imeṭṭawen”.
Ad d-neydar, ila Mizian Rahou d netta i ibedden x usegged n tira i wdlis-a amaynu.

Eisa, uqbel ad yemmet, yehdeṛ i Buṭrus, Yeequb, Yuḥenna d Andriyus ɣef “limaṛa n tisin-[is]”, ara d-ibanen deg wussan ineggura. Yefka-yasen daɣen i inelmaden-agi-ines yiwen n westeqsi yesean azal, yenna: “Anwa-t uqeddac agi unṣiḥ yerna d aeeqli, iɣef ara iwekkel ssid-is at wexxam-is iwakken a sen-iţţak lqut di lweqt?” (Matta 24:3, 45; Marqus 13:3, 4) Seg umeslay-agi “lqut”, ilaq-aɣ a d-nefhem lqut n ṛṛuḥ, yeeni tamusni ɣef Ṛebbi. Eisa, iţţusemman dagi “ssid”, iweed i inelmaden-is belli ad yextiṛ
... (143 chars skipped) ... 
iḥiyen yeţwadehnen. “Ţwadehnen” lmeena-s ţwaxtaṛen s ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi. “Akli-yagi” d Asqamu amwellah n Inagan n Yahwa. Yeţţak lqut n ṛṛuḥ i wid yeţţeebaden Yahwa. Fell-as kan i neţkel a ɣ-d-ifk “amur-[nneɣ] n yirden di lweqt.”—Luqa 12:42.
Iţţuwekkel ɣef “wexxam n Yillu”. (1 Timutawus 3:15) Eisa iwekkel “akli-yagi” ɣef wayen akk ixeddem weḥric yellan ɣef lqaea n tuddsa n Yahwa: yefka-yas ad iḍebber ɣef cci n weḥric-agi, ɣef ccɣel n uberreḥ akk-d uselmed di tjemmuyae-nneɣ. Iwakken a ɣ-d-imudd “wakli u
... (143 chars skipped) ...
jmueen d yegrawen-nneɣ.
“Akli-yagi” d “unṣiḥ”, yeeni yeṭṭef di tideţ n Wedlis Iqedsen akk-d leqdic n uberreḥ n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ, iɣef iţţuwekkel. D “aeeqli” daɣen imi ibedd akken ilaq ɣer leḥwayeǧ meṛṛa i gekseb Lmasiḥ ɣef lqaea. (Lecɣal 10:42) Yahwa yeţbarak-it: yesnernay ccɣel-is yerna yeţeawan-it akken ad yefreq lqut n ṛṛuḥ s ṭṭaqqa (lketṛa).—Iceaya 60:22; 65:13.
Anwa i gwekkel Eisa iwakken ad yefk lqut n ṛṛuḥ i inelmaden-is?
Acuɣer i nezmer a d-nini belli “akli-yagi” d “unṣiḥ” yerna d “aeeqli”?

Ar tṭṭafn ula tiɣawsiwin tisnzyamin nna tn ittyawsn ad skrn d ad ddarn. Ar ttddrn ar 120 wass d ar ttḥlakn ɣ tḥlibt, d ar ittyamaẓ uhémoglobine s imakrofaj n tasa, tḥlibt
... (378 chars skipped) ...
forz ɣ kra n tɣmrin: albumin, a1, a2, B, Y), lli ɣ gan imqqrann:

Kra ɣ iɣawsiwn ad gan lhormonat, izdar ad ilin gan lbrutinat, niɣ acids aminés ibddln, niɣ stéroïdes, niɣ lipides ibddln (zun d prostaglandines d thromboxanes).

Ihi, ddunit-a, tebna ɣef urgaz akked tmeṭṭut, d nutni i d sser n tudert, daymi ilaq tameṭṭut d urgaz ad kesben izerfan kif kif-iten. Tasenbert n teɣdemt tagreɣlant
Tasenbert n teɣdemt tagreɣlant (S Tegnizt: International Court of Justice, s usegzel: ICJ) akken i tettwassen s yisem n Tasenbert tamadlant[1]. D tasudut taɣedmant tagejdant n tuddsa n Yeɣlanen Yeddukklen.[2][3][4], Asutel-is yezga-d di Lahay (Hollanda). Dɣa tga d anagraw amyiwen seg 6 n inagrawen n Yeɣlanen Yeddukklen ur nelli ara di New York. Tennulfa-d deg useggas n 1945 tebda imahilen-is deg useggas n 1946 dɣa teṭṭef adeg n Tsenbert Tameɣlalt n Teɣdemt Tagreɣla
... (163 chars skipped) ... 
) armud aɣedman meqqren. Tbeṭṭu s unect n izarafen usaduf agreɣlan deg imennuɣen iɣedmen i d-yettilin gar n tmura
Taɣdemt-a tessuddes seg 15 n yimzurfa i ferren-iten wegraw amatu n yeɣlanen yeddukklen d useqqamu n Tɣellist i tenzagt (lmudda) n 9 n iseggasen. Akken i yezmer ad yili wallus (aɛawed) n wefran n yigmamen. ⅓ n yigmamen ttwafranen yal 3 n iseggasen akken i yegdel ad ilin sin n yimzurfa yezdin deg yiwet n teɣlent. Aḥbac n wezrem
Aḥbac n wezrem (Isem usnan: Lathyrus aphaca) d talmest n yemɣi seg twacult n Fabaceae . Carl Von Linné d amdan amezwaru i yuran fell-as deg useggas n 1753. Tamlest-a teḥseb-itt IUCN am d talmest ur tettwaggez.

Iṛufeq-it uneɣlaf n Temguri, Ahmed Zeghdar mi la yetteg tirzi-s n uswaḍ n yisenfaren n ugzum deg ugezdu, yenna-d Mass Arkab i tɣamsa dakken « tuqqna n teẓwar (urrig akked trisiri) n wasun-a amguran d ayen yellan d tamara i usebɣes deg useḍru n yisenfaren.
Seg iwala liḥala yerna yesla i yiwen n ufsir ɣef liḥala n wasun amguran aɣelnaw n Rbeɛṭac, yettwali uneɣlaf dakken acku taswiɛta ur yesɛi ara wasun-a amguran taẓwert n trisiti akked wurrig agaman, « yers gar yuɣalen d tadimt i usmahel n tidet n wasun », yezzireg-d ɣef tixxutert n « tuqqna gar yigzumen yemgarden terza temsalt akken ad yili uckaḍ n tuqqna n wasun ɣer teẓwert, s usnas n yiwellihen n uneɣlaf Amenzu ».
I wakken ad yefru wugur-a, yebder-d uneɣlaf aseɣnew n yiwet n tegrawt n umahil ara yeggensasen agezdu akked yiɣlifen yemgarden terza temsalt ara yebdun asekyed akked usumer n tefratin, seg yimala i d-iteddun d afella, akked usnas-nsent cwiṭ cwiṭ deg yiwen n umenḍar ur ntekk ara nnig n 4 wayyuren.

Tinaɣlalin (assaɣ ussnan: Vertebrata) d adadur n iɣersiwen ilan (yesɛan) ajgu n uzagur d uqecṛuṛ, adadur-a d win yeṭṭfen amur ameqqran n telmas n wadur n tmzukar s wazal n 64,000 n telmas yettwagelmen. Ibelɣen n tnaɣlalin d wid igan d imeẓyanen am yigra (talmest n Paedophryne amauensis) s webleɣ n 7,7 mm alamma d imeqqran deg-sen yakk (tizmekt tazegzawt) s webleɣ yugaren 33 m. Tinaɣlalin sgensisent-d azal n 4% n iɣersiwen ma d ayen i d-yegran gant d tiraɣlalin ur nli ara (ur nesɛi ara) ajgu n uzagur. Amur ameqran n tnaɣlalin lant ajgu n uzagur yebnan ɣef tegrawt n yiɣsan isem-it-sen tiɣlalin maca llant kra n telmas ur lint ara ajgu n uzagur n yiɣess amedya ɣer uweqqas. Yerna ajgu-ynes n uzagur d win igebren seg ugergis. Tinaɣlalin yakk lant tafekka d tizamalin (idis neɣ azgen ayeffus n tfekka-ynes yemmug am wezgen azelmaṭ). Tafekka n tnaɣlalin tebṭa ɣef yixef d igiger yerna tinaɣlalin yettidiren deg tegnit (lqaɛa) lant iri d snat n tyuga n yirawen
Tinaɣlalin gebrent seg tirɣesmarin d tinɣesmarin, igebren iselman ingergisen (am uweqqas d Tasewwant) d tɣesselmin d talmest tafurkan n tɣesselmin yettwassnen s yisem n tidkesman n irawen igebbren tikuẓdarin (tikelmanin, timsuṭaṭ d yigṭaṭ)

1 Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ixebbeṛ-ed ɛinani belli deg ussan ineggura, aṭas ara iwexxṛen ɣef liman di Lmasiḥ, ad tebɛen wid i ten-ițɣuṛṛun s uselmed i d-yețțasen s ɣuṛ leǧnun.
2 A ten-ɣuṛṛen wat sin wudmawen yețbecciṛen lekdeb, wid iwumi yemmut wul am akken yețwaqqed s useffud.
3 Imdanen-agi bɣan ad ḥeṛṛmen zzwaǧ akk-d kra n leṣnaf n lmakla, lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi ixleq-ed kullec iwakken wid yumnen yis yessnen tideț, a t-ḥemden a t-cekkṛen.
4 Ayen akk i d-ixleq Sidi Ṛebbi yelha, ur ilaq ara 
... (303 chars skipped) ... 
ṣfan.

8 Tazzla deg wannar d ayen yelhan meɛna tenfeɛ i lǧețța kan, ma ṭṭaɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi tenfeɛ i kullec axaṭer deg-s i tella tudert n tura akk-d ț-țin i d-iteddun i ɣ-iwɛed Sidi Ṛebbi.
9 Awal-agi d awal n tideț yuklalen ad ițwaqbel ɣer yemdanen meṛṛa.
10 Ma d nukni nețɛețțib iman-nneɣ iwakken a neǧhed di liman, imi nețkel ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ yeddren yel
... (303 chars skipped) ...
-ik di leqṛaya d ubecceṛ d uselmed n wawal n Ṛebbi i wiyaḍ, alamma usiɣ-en.
14 Ur țțaǧa ara di rrif tikci i k-d-ițțunefken s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi d yimeslayen s wayes i d-caren fell-ak di tejmaɛt mi ssersen ifassen-nsen fell-ak imeqqranen n tejmaɛt.
15 Err ddehn-ik ɣer wayagi txedmeḍ-t akken ilaq, iwakken imdanen meṛṛa ad walin amek i tețnerniḍ di tikli-inek di Lmasiḥ.
16 Ḥader ɣef yiman-ik d wayen i tesselmadeḍ i wiyaḍ, ma tkemmleḍ akken, d leslak ara d-tawiḍ i keččini akk-d wid i k-yesmeḥsisen.

Rran tamurt d tiẓgi; win izemren wayeḍ ad t-yeḥqer. Lqanun rran-t d aɛekkaz, yes-s kkaten wid it-yugin! Aǧadarmi yekkes amḍiq i ccix n leǧamaɛ, ccix n leǧamaɛ yekkes amḍiq i yilef di lexla! Ur d-yegri wa issuɣen, ur d-yegri wa yennaɣen!
At iččumar raɛen di tudrin, ayen? Iǧadarmiyen raɛen di tudrin, ayen? Yal wa yessikid wayeḍ, yal wa yettraǧu deg-wayeḍ ad d-yini kra. Ur yelli win ara d-yezwiren ass-a, ur yelli win ara iqablen asif i d-iḥemlen! Tudrin uɣalent d annar i twaɣiyin, uɣalent d axxam i
... (1025 chars skipped) ... 
an tidett ad tt-iqabel s lqedd! Ihdumen-agi i d-iẓedmen ɣer tudrin-nneɣ ɣer tmurt-nneɣ, ma yella neddukel am yiwen, ad uɣalen, ad mmḥun; s webrid i d-usan ara yuɣalen!
Irnaten Murad
D tidett akw ayen-akka id-tennid. Tamughli-k tsugh u ters akw ghef temsal-agi izgan ttdeggiren-agh, izgan zzemmin seg-nnegh. Akken qqaren at zik: aghyul n vava d jeddi rnigh rkva ar deffir. Maca tura, imi d-nenna kaw anect-a, imi nwala dacu ara iderrun yerna ur igh-ihwi ara anda tifrat? Amek ara as nveddel udem d tik
... (1025 chars skipped) ...
kken qqaren at zik: aghyul n vava d jeddi rnigh rkva ar deffir. Maca tura, imi d-nenna kaw anect-a, imi nwala dacu ara iderrun yerna ur igh-ihwi ara anda tifrat? Amek ara as nveddel udem d tikli? S tughalin ar ansayen imezwura? s tatrart d usennulfu n uvrid nniden? Amek ara nsellek iman nnegh d ixfawen nnegh?
Nek akken walagh, ad teddu ar zdat, ad tughal ar deffir, ad tneggez ar igenni, ad tres ar tmurt maca tidett yiwet-is kan: {{ad nerfed aveckid negh ad nengar}}. Tefra tfuk.

Asif n Danub (s talmant : Donau, s tasluvakt : Dunaj, s tahungarit : Duna, s tabulgart : Dunav, s tarumanit : Dunărea, s tukṛaniyt : Dunay)[1], asif n Turuft talemmast[2], d wasif wis sin i ɣezzif akk deg Turuft deffir Volga akked 2 850 km deg teɣzi[1].
Aɣbalu-s seg idurar n Tiẓgi Taberkant deg amalu n Lalman ed i yettawi ɣer Ilel Aberkan, yetteɛeddi ɣef 10 n timura : Lalman, Tutrict, Sluvakya, Maǧar, Kruwatya, Serbya, Bulgarya, Rumanya, Muldavya, ed Ukrayin[1], yetteɛeddi daɣen ɣef timanaɣin timeqqranin n Turuft em Vin, Budapest, Bratislava d Belgrad[3].

Netta, tezga tecmumeḥt isartiyen ɣef udem-is u itti lfuḍa ɣef umgarḍ-is.
Macci d tikkelt id-yusa Gilles Duceppe ar Leqbayel. Seg wass-mi I imlal d Ferḥat Mhenni, d tikkelt tis snat id-irza ar tmeɣriwin nneɣ.

TAMURT – Taqbaylit nneɣ cubaɣ-tt ɣer rreẓq ur d-ijmaiɛ ara ufellaḥ di lexla. Am win yeǧǧan rreẓq-is iḍaɛ. D acu ara yeḍrun ma iḍaɛ rreẓq di lexla ? Meḥsub at- ččen iɣersiwen n teẓgi am uccen, awtul, aweṭṭuf neɣ maḍi lmal n udaynin: d taɣaḍt, d azger, d aɣyul, ateg,…
Tella diɣen tayeḍ, d win ara iruḥen ad ijmaɛ ayla n medden, netta ayla-s at-yeǧǧ iḍaɛ. Asmi ara iqelleb fell-as ad yaf ifut-t lḥal, imiren as-yeqqar: aaah, a tin xedmeɣ, a rreẓq-iw iḍaɛen !…. Wwin-t iḥemmalen n waman, iruḥ yemmečč de
... (700 chars skipped) ... 
en-iḍegger ɣer wakal n tmazirt.
D amkan aɛzizen fell-as, kra yellan d lfakya yeẓẓa-tt dinna, am ṛṛemman, llxux, ifires, tajnant yernu as-yernu sin n tlata n lwidan n ṭumaṭic d lwad n ifelfel d tacukett n uẓalim (lebṣel) d wayeḍ n teskert (ticcert) d lbaṭaṭa, atg,…
Ihi, taqbaylit neɣ tamaziɣt, ilaq ad ten-ḥemmel am tmazirt; dinna imiren ad teffuktuy, ad tettnernay, ad teǧǧuǧǧug alamma tif lmelk n widak is-yebɣan lmut, is-yebɣan nneger. Tagara.

TABATENT– Azal n 1000 n yemdanen ay yessaggzen iman-nsen akken ad lemden deg tneɣrit n tmaziɣt i yimengaḍen deg temnaḍin yemgerraden n tmurt, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna, ass n ssebt, unemhal n usselmed d unadi deg Useqqamu Unnig i Timmuzɣa, Boudjemaa Aziri.
Yerna wemḍan-a s waṭas ɣef leḥsab n useggas yezrin aydeg ala 275 ay yessaggzen iman-nsen, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna Mass Aziri deg yijifeṛn tfugla n werẓam n useggas amaynu n usselmed n tmaziɣt i yimengaḍen i 2017-2018, d tafugla ay d-yellan deg wexxam n yedles n Mohamed-Laid-Al-Khalifa.
Aseggas-a, 25 n twilayin ay terza temsalt, deg wakud aydeg deg 2016, 24 n twilayin aydeg tettwasselmed tmaziɣt i yimengaḍen, ma deg 2015, ala 14 n twilayin aydeg d-yella waya, ɣef leḥsab n Mass Aziri ay d-yernan dakken tineɣriyin-a lhan-d yid-sent 50 n yiselmaden igurdisen, amur ameqran deg-sen ffɣen-d seg tesdawit tadzayrit yernu mmuzzgen deg tutlayt tamaziɣt, am wakken ay gan issilɣen deg tsenselmedt i yimengaḍen.
Tineɣriyin-a bḍant ɣef sin n yeswiren, amezwaru yerza wid ay yessnen ad ssiwlen tamaziɣt, ma d wis sin yerza wid ur yessinen ad ssiwlen tamaziɣt.
Iswi n wezwur-a d asmatu n usselmed n tmaziɣt, yernu deg 2019, ad yebdu usselmed n tutlayt-a ula s Internet, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna umasay-a.
Tafugla-a n werẓam n useggas amaynu tella-d s weḥdaṛn yikataren n tiddukla n ussegmek n Iqra, Adiwan Aɣelnaw n Ussegmek d Usselmed n Yimengaḍen, aɣella n ugezdu n tutlayt d yedles amaziɣn Tesdawit n Tbatent Tis 2 d yiselmaden ara d-yelhun s tneɣriyin-a.

Ij n trezzut temmal belli Uruppa deg-s aṭṭas n ttaḍeyyuɛ n macca: 153 Melyun ṭun n macca i ttett tzubayt mkul aseggʷas, kṭar zi min dd-tessadaf zi berra. Imrezzuten ttettren ad ibeddel uya.
Ṭṭaḍeyyuɛ n macca d ij n x-as aṭṭas n wawal. Zeg ij n jjiht mamek ttmenḍaran leḥwayej minzi yallah isslawen cwayt, zeg uɣeẓḍis nniḍen, di tmura am uliman, mnuɛ ad tjebded macca zeg ibidawen n wefraḍ. Cḥal qaɛ n ṭṭaḍeyyuɛ i yellan, d manaya xef tella tɣuri-ya.

Amtwi n Unwal
Amtwi n Unwal (nɣ imnɣi n unwal) iga yan zɣ imtwiyn n unɣi n Rrif, amtwi ad ijṛa gr imaziɣn irifiyn d tsrdast taṣbnyult ɣ 22 Yunlyu 1921 ɣ Unwal lli illan ɣ ugafay agmuḍan n Lmɣrib. Tettyunnra tsrdast taṣbnyult, tṛẓ yat tirẓi tasrdast mqqurn, aya ad yujjan iṣblyunn ad tt smmun s “Tawaɣit n Unwal" (s tṣblyunt: Desastre de Annual). Kigan n mddn msasan is d tirẓi ad ad akkʷ ihrcn g umzruy n tsrdast taṣblyunt tatrart.[1]
Iskr umtwi ad kra n tassasin tisrtanin mqqurnin, zgisnt taḍuri n 
... (867 chars skipped) ... 
 yiliḥ darsn anyalkam d wansatn isilann.[2] Awttas anggaru n umzizzl iga t usrus n yat tilit tasrdast tamɣlalt ɣ uslallu n Lḥusima lli igan yan udɣar astratiji gr uftas amɣribi utrim d ugmmuḍan.[3]
Taggalin tarulganin Tirifiyin llant ddaw n tɣlft Muḥmmad Bn Ɛbdlkrim Lxṭṭabi (Ittyusan uggar s Ɛbdlkrim) lli tt inn ikkan iga yan umawas d umssuɣl g Usira Aṣblyun n Iskkinn n Iṛṣliyn ɣ Mlilt, ig yan zɣ umɣarn n tqbilt n Ayt Wryaɣl.[4]

Yyaw kan !
Akken kan mazal aggur i 20 yebrir, tudrin n Leqbayel bdant ttheggint i tikli tameqrant : tikli n ijeğğigen, akken ad maggren tafsut, tagwennect n tudert. Irgazen d tlawin, imeqranen d imecṭuḥen, glan s ibenduyar, s ijewaqen, s snitrat d ṛṛayat, ffYen deg ixxamen-nnsen, gan tiqquftin, am zik-nni, ṭṭfen iberdan, s ccna deg yiles. D tiquftin timecṭuḥin, llulent-d di yal taddart, teddunt, tteeddint Yef tudrin nniḍen, renun-d Yer-sent lYaci, ttumYurent.
Atan iedda-d yiwen umesbrid, ibedd, 
... (3996 chars skipped) ... 
peaux, quittent leurs maisons, constituent des processions, comme dans le temps, et s'en vont par les chemins, avec des chants à la lèvre. Des petits cortèges naissant ici et là, dans chaque village, qui sur la route, ne tardent pas à grandir, en passant par d'autres villes et villages, qui les attendent.
"Où vont tous ces gens-là ?" questionne un étranger de passage", "Accueillir le printemps", lui répond l'un des participants. "Vous marcherez jusqu'où ?" , "Chercher de l'eau à Taksebt". L'étra
... (3996 chars skipped) ...
anée et peut-être du Monde. Montrons au monde que nous sommes un peuple joyeux et pacifique, que notre civilisation n'est pas morte, que nous sommes capables de nous organiser et d'organiser de grands évènements dignes de la marche de sel du Mahatma Gandi, du voyage initiatique des Indiens vers le Gange et des grandes manifestations carnavalesques de Venise et de Rio. Faisons dire au monde, chaque année, à la même époque :
Aujourd'hui, c'est le printemps en Kabylie. "Assagi d tafsut n Leqbayel."

Tamezgida yellan d tajmaɛt n wid meṛṛa yumnen s Lmasiḥ, tettusemma d tafekka n lmasiḥ. Netta yellan d amsellek, d aqerru ɣef tejmaɛt meṛṛa. D sser ameqṛan yellan di Tira iqedsen. Sser-agi yerna-d ɣef win n Lmasiḥ s yiman-is.
D acu-t sser n Lmasiḥ?
Linǧil n Yuḥenna ihedder-d ɣef Lmasiḥ yellan d "Awal" n Ṛebbi. D netta i d Ṛebbi. (Yuḥenna 1). Yusa-d i leslak n yemdanen. Tigzi n wemdan ad tamen s wayagi. Win akken yellan d "Awal" iban-d i talsa, iɛac yid-s, ibeggen-as-d abrid i leslak. Yettusemma d
... (481 chars skipped) ... 
en a t-ɛebden a t-ḥemden.
Lmasiḥ aked tmezgida-ines!
Ɣef sser n Lmasiḥ irrenu-d sser n tmezgida. Yuɣ lḥal akkennni i teddun deg azal-nsen. Dduklen "am iḍudan ufus". Akken yella di Tira iqedsen, Lmasiḥ d aqeṛṛu n tmazgida yellan d tafekka-ines. Azal nniḍen di Tira yeqqar-d daɣen, Lmasiḥ d argaz n tmezgida, nettat yellan d tameṭṭut-is. S wakka yewwi-d a nefrez belli, azal n lmasiḥ yeddukel d win n tmezgida. D lsas i s-ara ɣ-d-beggnent Tira lefhama-nneɣ n tmezgida d tudert-is. Mi ara nɣer kra n teb
... (481 chars skipped) ...
en" d agraw s liman s Ṛṛuḥ i sen-d-yettunefken sɣur Lmasiḥ. Iwakken ad ilin d yiwen n wegdud di liman d leḥmala n Lmasiḥ. D tawacult n Lmasiḥ yesbed s wesfel-ines fell-as, s leḥmala i d-yesser fell-as. (Ṛuman 5). Yeẓḍa deg-s tagmatt, ad teddukel ad tegmu s Wawal d Ṛṛuḥ. D lmasiḥ s Ṛṛuḥ-is i yesbedden tamezgida, yezdukel ɣur-s wid akk i d-yefda si ddnub d lmut. Ad uqlen d agdud yeddren ara yɛebden Ṛebbi s Ṛṛuḥ s tidett. Lmasiḥ icar-d ayagi i tmeṭṭut-nni tasamarit di Linǧil n Yuḥenna. (Yuḥenna 4).

Amḍan ummid n yiguta yettwazemlen d teṛmisin tiɣelnawin yewweḍ ɣer 827 s wazal n 219 n yimelyaṛen n yidinaṛen, seg gar 1.038 n yiguta yettwazemlen deg usḍisyur amezwaru n 2021, ɣef leḥsab n yisefka ay d-yettwasmenden deg tfugla n uzmal n Tesguri Tamatut n Tsertit n Ugbur Adigan d Unummed Aɣelnaw n Sonatrach.
Gar yiguta yettwazemlen d teṛmisin tizzayriyin, Sonatrach twemmeṛ 286 n yiguta d teṛmisin tinagdudin (35%) d 541 n yiguta d teṛmisin tusligin (65%).
Azal amakki n 1.038 n yiguta ay tezmel Sonatrach deg usḍisyur amezwaru n 2021 yewweḍ ɣer 430 n yimelyaṛen n yidinaṛen (3,25 n yimelyaṛen n yidulaṛen) ɣef wayyen ay d-yerna uɣbalu-a.
Deg wayen yerzan azunen n yiguta-a, 469 n yiguta rzan « asisi n tɣawsiwin ay teḥwaj teṛmist » (gar-asen 277 n yiguta d teṛmisin tiɣelnawin) s wazal n 28 n yimelyaṛen n yidinaṛen, 373 n yiguta rzan « imeẓla » (gar-asen 359 n yiguta d teṛmisin tiɣelnawin) s wazal n 152 n yimelyaṛen n yidinaṛen, 152 n yiguta rzan « imahilen » (gar-asen 151 n yiguta d teṛmisin tiɣelnawin) s wazal n 35 n yimelyaṛen n yidinaṛen, 37 n yiguta n « tezrawt d usemter » (gar-asen 33 n yiguta d yiɣelnawen) s wazal n 0,4 d amelyaṛ n yidinaṛen d 7 n yiguta n usɣiwes, asisi d tmeṣkiwt d yineblagen izzayriyen s 15 n yimelyaṛen n yidinaṛen, ɣef leḥsab n yisefka n Sonatrach.

Le Rifain
Saɛid Abernus, yettwassen ɣer yirifiyen d yimaziɣen amen kemlen s tiddi-nnes tameqrant deg yiger n tira n umezgun d usefru, timezgunin i yura, merra iraren-tent x yisaysen, ɛejbent i yimeḍfar n baba-s n tẓuriwin.
Maca udem-nneɣni n uamari Saɛid Abernus, yettwassen di Facebook, awarn i umi yesmun tizemmamin i ttuɣa ittari aṭṭas zeggami, uca yegg°a-tent ḥma a tent-idd yessufeɣ deg yijj n lqaleb n useḍḥek, yeɛdu weswir-nnes s waṭṭas min nẓarr deg utilibizyun, i xef xessren aberru n tenɛacin d ulujistik d usewjed…
Saɛid Abernus, s utilifun-nnes waha, yiweḍ ad yili d itri s Bikembawer. isem-a i dd-yejbed zeg yijjen tḥajit n yijjen ttuɣa-t deg uliman wer yessin ad yessiwel talimant, wer yufi mamek ɣa yini i « s cway cway », ixarres deg umirar n čama Franz Beckenbauer, uca yenna-s: « bikembawer, bikembawer »!
Bikembawer, teɛjeb aṭṭas i yinni tt-iḍeffren, yessexdam deg-s Saɛid Abernus iles n trifit d ddarija d taɛrabt, yessraqqa deg-s tfawt x ca n tmeslayin yudrus wi dasen-ittaɣaren, s yijjen tmamek d jjdid tettessur jer tidet d tḍeḥḥakt, tessawaḍ tibratin.
Manaya ittejja isitimen zi Bikembawer ḥuma ad yalleɣ cwayt s tmaziɣt, ad yaf wi das-ɣa yessiɣen afus ḥuma ad yewc merra min ɣer-s, ad yeɛdu deg utilifizyun.

Beddent ktar zi 26 n tmesmunin Timaziɣin aked tselmadt n Tmaziɣt Kawtar Tuzani i yessɣaran di tinmel n “Aquḍaḍ” id yusin di tɣiwant n Ayt Ukil Ulad Mḥend itteqqnen ɣar temnaḍt n Nnaḍuṛ, awarni umi xafs iɛedda unemhal n tinmel wami id yessars aṭṭaṣ n tɛenkraf zzats, yugi ad tt yejj ad teṭṭef tadala (la classe) nnes ad tessɣar Tmaziɣt.
Nnant timesmunin ila min id as yemsaren i Tuzani yus d deg ijjen usatal n uɛeddi x iselmaden n Tmaziɣt, i yettagin inemhalen ad ten jjen ad ssɣaren ula d nitni tutlayt Tamaziɣt; mamc ttarent timesmunin zi Neyyaba n Nnaḍuṛ maḥend ad teṛẓem n ijjen umsawal aked iselmaden, u ad tesbedd ddegg a n iɛeddeyyen x iselmaden u tettarent zzays ḥuma ad texdem ḥuma ad terzu x ifessayen i ɣa yxdmen ameḥḍar d uselmad.

iɣmes-as baba-s, ittezɣal, g uderriɛ-ines.
Min cekk-yuɣen tettadef-dd g ixef-inek, a memmi?
Maɣar a baba, ur tettwilid muk dd-ittxzzar gi,
s ttaj d uselham, ugellid n imeḍzi?
Uhu, tin-ɣir d tagguyt gi tseqfin tbenni.
As-dd ay ameẓẓyan. Azzel, aker ɣer-i!
Ass-dd, ad teɛyard tirart tekna akid-i,
Ass-dd, qa da nnewwac igga iẓekki,
Yemma-k tettraja-cekk, s tmelsa ur telli.
Baba ḥennu, ur tettwilid azellid n imeḍẓi
Iznuza-ay, gi lḥiss, tirja n udummi?
Win d aḍu issenehzza tifray, a memmi,
Issenḍaq-itent uka sɣuyyunt amnni.
Ttugid ad dd-tasd, yak ay asebḥan, dani?
Yak wwiɣ-dd akid-i xelli d yessi,
Netnint d tiweqqafin x ccḍiḥ n llyali,
Ad cekk-ttẓurent s lɣnuj-nsent, ar tgemmi.
Baba ḥennu, a baba, ma ur tettwilid ula d ci
Sebɛa n yessis n uzellid, gi tallest, ssawalent aki?
A memmi ḥnnu, necc ttwaliɣ ci nneɣni,
Ttwaliɣ tiṣefṣafin ttebsissiqent ar ṭṭya n tziri.
Necc qa xseɣ-cekk, aẓri inek ur gi ijji ci,
s lxaḍar niɣ s bezzez, a cekk dd-awiɣ ɣer-i.
A baba, aqa-t yusi-dd, s ufus n lexyal, ɣer-i!
Igzem-ay, igzem-ay, uzellid n imeḍẓi!
Ababat ksin-t tcukaḍ, ittcukka deg uyis,
deg uderriɛ-ines, ittirnin memmi-s,
ur inni ar wami iwweḍ ar taddart-ines,
deg yuderriɛ-ines, immut memmi-s
Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Tamrikt Talemmast
Tamrikt Talemmast d aḥric alemmas n Temrikt (maca, deg tidet, yettwaḥseb d aḥric seg Temrikt n Ugafa). Tamrikt Talemmast deg-s timura n Gwatimala, Belize, Honduras, Nicaragua, Kusta Rika ed Panama. Tajumma-nnes, s ujemmal, 523.780 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 41.739.000 n yimezdaɣen.
Tumira n Tamrikt Talemmast :
- Gwatimala (Guatemala)
- Belize (Belmopan)
- Honduras (Tegucigalpa)
- Salvadur (San Salvador)
- Nicaragua (Managua)
- Kusta Rika (San José)
- Panama (Panama)

Miksik
Miksik nɣ Lmiksik (s tsbnyulit: México), ism amddud iga t Iwunak munnin n Miksikanus (s taṣbnyulit Estados Unidos Mexicanos ) tga yat tagdudant tafidiralitn tamirikanit, tili ɣ unẓul n Iwankn Munnin n Marikan. Tg yat tmazirt lli mi iggut urky nns s takat n 120 mlyun n imzdaɣn. Tg tmdint n Miksiku tamaẓunt nns.
Tga tamazirt n Miksik talli ɣ kullu ggutn middn lli isawaln tasblyunit. Tg Tis kraḍt immqqurn ɣ urky nns d tis snat ɣ tuggut n takat nns ɣ kullu marikan talatint. ɣ usggas n 2009 tga tdamsa nns tis snat ɣ tmurranin n tdamsa n umaḍal s yan PIB n 1482 n mlyar n Dular amirikani (USD)
Illa 31 n awalak ɣ Lmiksik ismunt yat tanbaṭ tafidiralit:

Bgayet, 25 tuber – SIWEL – Ass-a ṣṣbeḥ teḍra-d yiwet n laksida ɣef 7t30 deg webrid aɣelnaw uṭṭun 26 i d-yessagran imejraḥ deg tama n inelmaden iɣaren di tesdawit n Bgayet.
Ger Waḍɣir akked Mellala yemyagar lkar i d-yewwin isdawiyen yettililin di Bercic akked ufurgu. Imi tikwal ḍerṛun-tt-d tedyanin yugaren laɛqel, ulac lmuta.

bɛa n Ayt Iraten, Buɣni d Wayt Xlili gar 1 d 11 n wayyur-a, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna tmehla tadinagt n Teṛmist n Ussedger n Tlemmast ay yebdan daɣ aserreḥ n wurrig i 608 n yexxamen deg tɣiwanin n Uẓeffun, Tizi Wezzu d Wayt Wasif, d tamhelt ay d-yebdan ass n lḥedd yernu ad tkemmel arma d ass n ssebt.

... (303 chars skipped) ...
2017 ar ass-a ɣer 26.999, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna teɣbalut-a.
Deg terzi-nnes n umahil ɣef tdayṛa n Laṛebɛa n Ayt Iraten, yerẓem uwali urrig agaman i 1898 n twaculin timesfaydiyin deg yiɣerman n Ayt Ɛṭelli, Tawrit Meɣɣren d Wayt Fṛeḥ. Tuqqna n yexxamen-a d ayen ay d-yesqamen 495 n yimelyunen n yidinaṛen, ɣef wakken ay d-iwekked.
Yerna-d uwali dakken ad ikemmel umahil n tuqqna n wemḍan ameqran akk n yexxamen seg-a ɣer tgara n useggas akken ad zemren wugar n medden ad sɛeddin tagrest-nsen deg weẓɣal.

Ih d inselmen yifen akk inselmen yellan deg umaḍal, nwala-ken amek i teddarayem tabarda ass i deg tekkatem aɣyul. Ih kenwi d inselmen, yesusumen ɣef tidett iken-ittḍurrun, ih d inselmen iḥemmlen lekni sdat wid iken-yuɣen, iwen-islufuyen akken ad tuḥmadem.

anfut-tt acku tettawi-d lhem!

Di tazwara ak-iniɣ afud uzmir (iǧehdden) di yeqdic-nwen keč d imddukal-ik d ttemddukal-ik deg umaṭaf n radio tiziri .
Imi tura ɣur-wen tidwilin kra yekka umalas ( toute la semaine).
Walaɣ belli tadwilt n Kamal d Fazya d ayen iggarzen : » awal d umedyaz »
Nek awen-iniɣ amer ad t-arnum tin » isebtar n tsekla » ( les pages littéraires ) n timawit (orale), d wayen yettwarun zik neɣ tura.
Tin nniḍen, tadwilt n tdamsa ara yesɛun aswir d yeswi (niveaux et objectif).
Tamawt :
Graɣ tamawt, d akken amaṭaf tamurt neɣ tiziri yewwi-d abrid iban-d s wudem am akken d radio ti-snat , maca nek walaɣ belli radio n teqbaylit ur ilaq ara ad t-ili am radio ti-snat di kra n temsal adɣa, isental ( les thématiques) id t-ttawi.
Am akken qqaren tagi d ttamawt kan.

di ddars n nhara ad nelmed manis dd yusa yisem n 'Amsterdam'; ad nZar 3awed mayemmi Harry de Bruin issemghara zi ccan n temghart nnes. Rik d Wil ad anegh sseknenet mamec ghar negg Huma ad nqess tawriqt n ttram nigh n ttubis di Amsterdam.
Di ddars n nhara ad tzarm mamaec tteggen iwdan xmi xsen ad raHen ghar tudrin n wayawya: ma tteggen awal d amezwar nigh ttraHen waha. Ad tZarm 3awed min ghar teggem di tHanet nigh supermarché, d mayemmi Maria Alvarez tessemghara attas zi mevrouw van den Berg.
di ddars a ad tzarm imezdagh n Amsterdam ssawalen xef tendint nsen, i ked dd ittas wawal n 'gezellig' aTTas! ad awem tini Riek d Wil minghar teggem mala tarzzum pasapurti d jjdid. Ad issiwel Ali KARA ad awem yini mayemmi ittwla tajjart nnes Ana d ij n temghartimghar ccan nnes.

Wikipedia:Goulenn kemmañ ur bajenn bet prennet
Pal ar bajenn-mañ eo goulenn ma vo degaset ur c'hemm bennak war ur pajenn warezet pe damwarezet. Evit goulenn un dra bennak all ouzh ar verourien, klikit amañ.
Amañ e c'hallit goulenn ma vo degaset ur c'hemm bennak en ur bajenn warezet. Ma tenn ar c'hemm a c'houlennit d'ur pennad bet prennet abalamour d'ur Brezel skridaozañ war ar bajenn-se, n'eo ket dav ober ar goulenn ma n'eus ket bet tizhet ur c'henemglev war pajenn gaozeal ar pennad.
Sellit ouzh an dezverkoù evit ar pajennoù gwarezet (war Wikipedia:Pajennoù prennet) a-raok goulenn ma vo kemmet tra pe dra en ur bajenn warezet bennak.

Mbeed lḥif d lmerta i idummen ugar n eecra n yiseggasen, anda ttawin imawlan arraw-nsen imeeḍar seg Dayra n Meatqa ɣer uɣerbez uslig n tɣiwant n Boukhelfa, deg tamdint n Tizi Uzzu, tettunefk-as-d i tddukkla Itran snat n tzaɣwa n uselmed deg uɣerbaz n Muḥemmed Miludi deg taddart n Tiɣilt Maḥmud, yettabaeen ɣer tɣiwant n Ssuk El Tenin deg dayra n Meatqa.
Ferḥen nezzeh yimawlan n yimeeḍar s tigawt-agi i d-yezgan deg lmendad n uselmed. Sya ara siwḍen yimḍebbren n tɣiwan ɣer wayen waeden yis-s, s leb
... (109 chars skipped) ... 
 n yimḍebbren n tddukkla n yimawlan n imeeḍar Itran, d Tanmehla n temsal timazdayin (DAS) i d-yefkan ttesriḥ i uselmed n yigerden deg tzeɣwa n uɣerbaz-agi.
Ihi, d taekemt meqqren i yettwakksen ɣef yimeeḍar d imawlan-nsen, i yezgan deg lmerta seg 6h n tsebḥit, akken ad awḍen zik ɣer uɣerbaz uslig n Buxalfa. Ugar n 36 n yinelmaden imeeḍar i yettwajerden yakan deg uɣerbaz-agi amaynut, ɣef leḥsab n uselway n tɣiwant n Ssuk El Tenin Mass Khermous Slimane. Llan ugar n 100 n yimeɛḍar i tesea Dayra n Me
... (109 chars skipped) ...
yimḍebber amezwaru n tɣiwant n Sukk El Tenin s ufus n tallelt s wayen akk yezmer i yinalmaden imeeḍar.
Am waken, diɣ, yewɛed s usewjed n yiwen ulemmas n uselmed n yimeeḍar s lebɣi n lwali n Tizi Uzzu deg yiseggasen i d-iteddun. Ferḥen aṭas yinelmaden s uɣerbaz-agi-nsen amaynut, i yesean akk ttawilat iwatan akken ad ɣren deg-s deg tegnatin igerrzen. Dɣa, yewwi-d ɣef yimeelmen n temḍiqt-agi, ad fken afus n tallelt i tddukkla Itran akken ad tbedd ɣer tama n yimeeḍar-agi akken iwata lḥal.

Tizi Wezzu, 20 tuver (SIWEL) – Tidukliwin n tuddar, tidukliwin tidelsanin akked tdukliwin n ddin n taddart Adrar di tɣiwant n Weɣrib, deg udewwar n Uzeffun, ssutren deg Lwali n Tizi Wezzu a d-yaf tifrat iy iɣeblan i deg xebbḍen imezdaɣ yal ass. Ger 16 n tneqqiṭin i suturen; aqeɛɛed n iqudas n waman n wedrar imi qqaren « lɛinṣer n Ugellid » i deg sfayden waṭas n imezdaɣ; lgaz i yɛeddan ɣef wakal-nnsen war ma sfayden; iberdan yehruran; asufeɣ n waman n diri; axxam n ilemẓiyen; tazeqqa n waddal; lkantinat deg iɣerbazen… Wid teɛna temsalt, yessefk fell-asen a d-rren lbal-nnsen i ferru n wuguren n imezdaɣ ?!

di lwesst n lherd x yiger n technology. Yenna-yi ijjen, ij n useqsi, yeqqim itenned-ayi deg uzellif. Inna‑dd: ttegged cwayt n “Deep web”?.
“Deep web” niɣ web‑yullɣen aṭṭas it‑ittxellaten aked web‑yessullssen “Dark web”. Nitni d tnayen leḥwayej msebḍan munen di tecti. Ḥima a nebḍa jer‑asen. Ad newc ij n umeḍya:
Lerifian.fr aqqet di web‑nurmal. Izemmer ijj zi ṭṭerf ad t-yadef ad iẓer min dag-s. Amcnaw mamek zemmaren imulluɣen “Inni yettmulluɣen[1]” (Crawlers). Imulluɣen-a mani mma tella ca
... (608 chars skipped) ... 
lɣen.
‑
Maca xmi idd‑ɣa‑nas ɣer web‑yessullsen, Tbarda ttneqlab. Dark web wer zemmren a ɣer-s awḍen imulluɣen-nni niɣ d iwdan zi ṭṭerf. Issiten yellan di web yessullsen yeqseḥ ad ten‑tesned. Yeqseḥ ad ɣer-sen tawḍed. Isiten iyellan ssullsen wer tkemmilen ca s “.com” niɣ “.net” niɣ ca nneɣni. Isiten yessullsen tkemmalen s “.onion”. Ttraḥen zeg ufus ɣer ufus. Iqseḥ ijjen zi ṭṭerf a ɣer-sen yadef. Minzi tteḥwajan ij n uprugram spisyal i itejjan wi yexsen a ɣer-s tili tzemmer ad iẓer min deg-sen deg
... (608 chars skipped) ...
eb yessullsen wessxen‑t. Idwel dag-s uzenzi n ddruga s yeklusa‑nnes marra. Azenzi n yegmanen (Organ) n yewdan. D marra min izemmer bnadem a deg-s ixaress.
Urid web yessullsen waha i ttuɣa yellan d ij n lḥajet d tasebḥant di beddu-ness. I dewlen d ca wer yeḥli. Netta d ijj zeg waṭṭas n tmeslayin yecnan i ggin yewdan, maca dayɛen‑tent yewdan‑nneɣni.
[1] Imuturen n tarezzut, Amcnaw Google d Bing d Yandexx, Yer‑sen can arrubut lxedmet‑nsen ad rzun deg web tt‘arcifan marra min zemmern ad Yer-s awḍen.

San Francisco
San Francisco d tamdint deg ugafa n California, deg Yiwunak Yeddukklen.
Deg San Francisco ay d-yettekkayen zzheṛ d Golden Gate Bridge, Golden Gate Park, Fisherman's Wharf d Alcatraz. Tamdint-nni daɣen d tamnaḍt kan i unagraw-nnes n tkeṛṛust.
Tettwali-d yiwet seg temdint ɣlayen akk deg tmurt-nni aydeg ara yedder.

Smaɛil Meǧber
Smaeil Meǧber, amyaru s tmaziɣt, yiwen seg imezwura seg imɣnasen n tmaziɣt. Smaeil Meǧber ittidir tagara-ya deg Franṣa anda yettkemmil amahil d unadi ines.
Akk d imaɣnasen nniḍen (Harun, Ceradi, atg) yessuffeɣ-d s tuffra deg teɣremt n Lezzayer tisɣunin am «Iṭṭij », « Taftilt »… axaṭer adabu iḥewṣen kra yellan d azref n useẓreg, igedlen akk iberdan n usnefli n tutlayt tamaziɣt. Daɣen Smaeil Meǧber isufɣ-d deg tasɣunt 'ABC Amaziɣ' i yelḥan d acḥal iseggasen (1996-2001) armi teḥbes. Anecta i senjmat-id di yiwen n idlis id yeffɣen ar tizrigin 'Harmattan' di Franṣa deg 2006. Isema-yas : ABC amazigh, une expérience éditoriale 1996-2001.
Smaeil Meǧber illa, u mazal-it, ikat aṭas af tutlayt n lejdud-is. Ifka tadiwinit i weɣmis n Dépêche de Kabylie, deg uṭṭun 3149 ass n umhad 9 wenbeṛ 2006. Yerra-t id w-asmel n tasekla imyura.net ar tutlayt tazwawt. Smaeil Meǧber ifka-d degs tamuɣli ines af umenuɣ af tutlayt tamaziɣt amek ilaq ad yili ar zdat. Attan tadiwinit amek tella.
Izdayen uffiɣen[beddel | edit source]

FREIBURG (Tamurt) – Kra n wawalen ɣef Yennayer Amaziɣ Amaynut 2966. Yennayer amaziɣ yettwassen di yal tamurt n tmazɣa, yettwassen anida llan imaziɣen deg umaḍal. Ass amenzu n yennayer yettili d tameɣra ɣer imaziɣen merra. Yettili d ass n tmeɣra ula ɣer waɛraben di tmura n tmazɣa yernu ẓran d tameɣra tamaziɣt.
Di tmurt-nneɣ „Tamazɣa-Talemmast“ neqqar-as daɣen „imensi useggas“, „ixef useggas“ neɣ «tiwwura useggas.» Tameɣar n yennayer amaziɣ d asirem i wakken aseggas ad yelhu, lemwared (aman) a d u
... (421 chars skipped) ... 
 yelli ula di kra uwanek n tmazɣa d ass n lficta, anida ixeddamen ur xeddmen ara yernu ttwaxellaṣen. Annect-a yeskanay-d idles amaziɣ mazal-it yettwarkeḍ.
Kra n wawalen ɣef weɣbel n tdukkli n tarwa n tmurt-nneɣ. Anwa i d abrid ay abrid?
Ass n Yennayer amaziɣ d ass d tameɣra, d acu kan yesmektay-yaɣ-d ɣef iɣeblan-nneɣ, yesmekray-aɣ-d ɣef uzaglu yersen ɣef idles-nneɣ. Ihi assudes n tmeɣra n yennayer d tizli daɣen ɣef izerfan-nneɣ nekni s yizwawen, akk d imaziɣen-nniḍen. Ayen yeḍran yid-neɣ nekni s
... (421 chars skipped) ...
 i wakken a nessiweḍ ula d nekni anida i ssawḍen iɣerfan-nniḍen. Ihi yessefk a nemsefhem nekni s yizwawen belli: d aɣref i nella, nesɛa tutlayt n twuri (lxudma) di tmurt-nneɣ. Ɣur-neɣ tugdut, nettqadar izerfan n wemdan (argaz, tameṭṭut), nettqaḍar tilelli n ddin, abrid-nneɣ ɣer tlelli-nneɣ d abrid n talwit ara ad yeqqim. Ihi ma nemsefham ɣef annect-a, iberdan ɣer iswin-nneɣ i wakken a nili d aɣef am iɣerfan nniḍen yesɛan iwunak, zemren ad ilin mačči yiwen.

33 n teẓṛigin di ṛṛaḥba taɣelnawt tis 5 n wedlis
EL BAYADH- Tadwilt tis semmus (5) n ṛṛaḥba taɣelnawt n wedlis teṛẓem ass n ttlata tameddit deg wexxam n tmeskaniyin n El Bayadh, s utekki n 33 n teẓṛigin n tmurt.
Tadwilt-agi, ters ɣef usentel "adlis d tidmi n yiɣerfan", deg-s izwal yemxallafen, ladɣa wid yerzan aɣzerbaz, idlisen n tussna d tesnatwilt daɣen.
Aṛẓam n tmesbanit-agi, ay d-tessuddes tmehla n yedles n twilayt, tufrar-d s lɣaci muqqṛen d-yerzan ɣer-s ladɣa anda rsen yedlisen isdawaniyen n yakk tangayin (azref, amezruy, tasekla, ...) akk d yedlisen n wesɣan.

Mbaɛed tamettant n tnelmadt tatyartit deg tmzduɣt tasdawant n WLED FAYET tefḍeḥ-d liḥala n miḥyaf i tettidir tesdawit Tazzeyrit, d tazɣent deg yal aḥric? ama d učči ama d ayen yecudden ɣer uɣudu , leqraya neɣ d tezdeg.
Ayen yeswhamen d tufɣa n uneɣlaf asdawannan anda i d-iwked d akken awanek d win i d-yettaken tadrimt meqqren i ulmud-a macca deg unnar ur d-ibban wara ɣef aya issawl-d ar uɛeddi deg ugzum mdden ɣer win ussileg xarṣum ad nebdu deg wayen iqnen ar tneččit, arnu ɣur-s yenna d akken llan ixedamen d wid ur nxddem ara akken iwata.
Ma Tadukli Taɣelnawt n Yinelmaden Izzayriyen d wid yesawallen i ussgem i kra yellan deg tmezduɣin tisdawanin ama d asaḥmu deg texxamin n yiḍes, deg tneččit d wayen-nniḍen imi ɣer iɛeggalen-a ilaq uɛiwed amatu i liḥala tettidir tesdawit ass-a n wussan.

«ɣef kra n imentalen n umezruy, taɣerma n imaziɣen d taɣerma n wawal », id d-yenna Mouloud Mammeri. Timetti n imaziɣen d timawit, maci d tirawit, imi ihedder yimi, amezzuɣ yasmuzgut. Zzik, imdanen llan tteklen kan ɣef wayen ara yessekles wallaɣ-nsen. Akka id teḥrured tmedyazt taqbuṛt di tallit-agi n wawal. Tella tettenkukuc deg yimi ɣer umeẓẓuɣ, deg tessuta ɣer tayeḍ, ar almi d kren wid ttyuran. Imezwura d igren iman-nsen akken ad arun tamedyazt, ilaq ad d-nesmekti, d imyura lak d imazrayen ijen
... (129 chars skipped) ... 
tella daɣen d allal iṣeḥḥan ɣef ayeg tekkan imnadiyen d imazrayen m’akken ttnadin ɣef umezruy n wegdud amaziɣ. Amedyaz yella yettawi-d deg usefru-ines ayen yak icudden ɣer tudert-is di tmetti : uguren d-yettmager, amek yettidir, acu isett, asirem-is, yebbi-d awal daɣen ɣef ṭṛadat yerẓan azaglu n wegdud d wayen nniḍen icudden ɣer tudert-is di tmetti ( la société). « Deg tmetti n leqbayel, tamedyazt d afaris anbaz ( produit collectif). Amedyaz uqbel ad yili d amedyaz, yettili d win d-yeqqaren tide
... (129 chars skipped) ...
rcours poétique ». Isefra n imedyazen iqbuṛen, yellan d annar n unadi i wid iqedcen deg umezruy, tasenmatit (la sociologie), tasekla, uɣalen daɣen d lɛinṣeṛ anda d tt-essen imedyazen itraren iten-yettwalin am lmul i ylaq ad qadren akken ad twenneɛ ula d tamedyazt-nsen. « Llan ula d kra n imedyazen imeqranen ttɛawaden-d deg kra n yefyar n imedyazen imezwura », id d-enna T. Yacine. Tamedyazt-agi taqbuṛt tuɣal d aɣerbaz (école) i ymedyazen itraren (modernes), gar-asen ad d-nebder Matoub Lounès.

Deg tɣult n temguri, smenden-d asenfar n tanaḍt taslekmant ara yesneflen yernu ad tessmed tanaḍt taslekmant 20-312 n 15 Wamber 2020 yerzan tiwtilin d yiskaren n tukci n usireg n usedwen n yizraren d yisgulaf n ufares yettwaṣeggmen deg ukatar n yirmuden n ufares n yifarisen d yimeẓla. Isenwiyen ay d-yettwarnan ɣer tanaḍt-a iswi-nsen d asifses n usedwen n yizraren d yisgulaf-a.
Deg tɣult n yimahilen inagduden, gan-d aneskin ɣef sin n yisenfaren n tanaḍin tislekmanin yerzan tasguri n tenfa tanagdudt n temhal-a:
- Timeṣkiwt n yinifif deg udeg anda ay yemlal Ubrid Aɣelnaw Wis 8, Abrid Aɣelnaw Wis 61 d Ubrid Aɣelnaw Wis 59 deg tɣiwant n Kalitus.
- Asisleg n Ubrid n Twilayt 133 s teɣzef n 6,5 n yikilumitren, d tigezmi yellan gar ubrid n twilayt 142 d ubrid n twilayt 233, am wakken ara yilint snat n tleggiyin deg tgezmi-a.
Deg tɣult n umahil, asemres d tɣellist tanmettit, smenden-d yiwen n usenfar n tanaḍt taslekmant ara yesneflen yernu ad yessmed tanaḍt taslekmant 15-289 n 14 Wamber 2015 yerzan taɣellist tanmettit n yimdanen war talawit ay yettgen irmuden i yiman-nsen. Asenfar-a n tanaḍt yella-d deg ukatar n tsemmeskal n tɣellist tanmettit i usifses n tsekkirin n usefrek n unagraw n tɣellist tanmettit n wid yettmahalen war talawit.
Deg tɣult n tmerrit d tenḍi, yessemned-d uneɣlaf n tmerrit d tenḍi yiwen n uneskin ɣef uzeddi n yiwet n tnegga ara yilin d takwat tayiwnant i lmend n usefrek n tferka tamerrant d tmunit n yisenfaren n usefti deg tɣult n tmerrit.

Lqʷran nɣ Lquran nɣ Quran ( s taɛrabt : القرآن —Al qu'ran neɣ القرآن الكريم—Al-qur'an al-karim ) iga aḍris asgdan akkʷ ilan atig ɣ Lislam. Ar tinnin imuslmn ɣ is iga awal n rbbi d is-d netta ad t-id issugzn f umazan nnes Muḥmmad. Ar ɣassad, udlis ad iga udlis amzwaru d udlis nna akk iqburn ittawsan is ittyura s tutlayt taɛrabt.
Umnen akkʷ imuslmn d imumnen s lquran is iga awal n rbbi isggizt-id s ils aɛrab lmubin, f umazan Muḥammad s ubrid n lmalak Jibril ɣ kigan n tmldawin zɣ lbiɛta nns ɣ usggʷas 610 ar tamttant nns ɣ wass n 8 yunyu 632. Ibḍa Lquran s 114 n tassurt, illa gis 6236 n layat. Illa ɣ Lquran layat makkiya d tiyyaḍ madaniyya. Lquran lkarim iga adlis amggaru zɣ idlisn n rbbi, issgizt rbbi f nbi Muḥammad . D tilawat n lquran d ussfld nns d twuri sis gan kullu lɛibadat ar sisn ittaẓ umuslm i rbbi bac ayzddig ul nns. Tssnti tɣrma n imuslmn dffir ma iggiz Lquran s wakal.

LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Iremmaɣen imihawen i tenɣa deg Bgayet, amenzu n tuber, tsensirt n Tredsa taɣelnawt taɣerfant smagin-ten, i d-yenna ass n larebɛa uɣlif n Temḥaddit taɣelnawt deg yiwen n welɣu.
‘’Seg tga tsensirt n Tredsa taɣelnawt taɣerfant yiwet n temzelt n tɣara, ass n 01 tuber 2017 deg Leqṣer, tawilayt n Bgayet (Tamnaḍt taserdasant tis 5), i yessawḍen ɣer tinɣi n semmus (05) n yiremmaɣen imihawen akked usegrew n semmus (05) n tmekḥal n unṭag tsekka n Kalachnikov akked ddeqs n yikarṭucen, sakin smagin inaɣayen-nni’’, i d-tesseddi teɣbalut-nni.
‘’Aremmaɣ amezwaru isem-is G. Youcef, i umi ttinin Abu Keɛkeɛ, yekcem ɣer tegrawin n yiremmaɣen deg useggas n 1993, wis sin isem-is B. Abdelhamid, i umi ttinin Abu Ḥasan, yekcem ɣer tegrawin n yiremmaɣen deg useggas n 1995, wis kraḍ isem-is M. Karim, i umi ttinin Ḥamza, yekcem ɣer tegrawin n yiremmaɣen deg useggas n 2005, wis kuẓ isem-is T. Redouane, i umi ttinin Abu Ǧeɛfer, yekcem ɣer tegrawin n yiremmaɣen deg useggas n 2007 akked wis semmus isem-is R. Mohamed Lamine, i umi ttinin Abu Derdaɛ’’.

Iḍelli, asleɣmay n terbaet taɣelnawt, mas Rabeḥ Saedan, yenna-d belli amyurar aqbayli Γiles, amnṭag n terbaet taglizit Hal City, ur yettekki ara deg teqbuct n tefriqt, ad d-yilin deg waggur n yennayer i d-iteddun, deg Ungula. Asleɣmay yenna-d belli tukksa n Γiles seg terbaet, sebba-s d tazmert n tfekka-s d tẓuri-ines.
Maca tidet, d ayen nniḍen yakk! Medden yakk ẓran belli Γiles yettzuxxu s teqbaylit-is, yettaṭṭaf-d tiwlafin s usenjaq aqbayli, ayen ur yeejiben ara i yimdebbren ɣef uqerruy-nsen Butefliqa.

« Mi nwiɣ lmuja ffleɣ-as, ziɣ lebḥar yegguni-yi ! ». Ul-agi-inu d amehbul, mi yenwa yufa iman-is, ad yečč tiyita, ma ur teqqid ḥseb tɣusa.
Ul, akken yessidir i yneqq, a wer ččeɣ ul-iw, a wer yemmet wul-iw, a wer yellez, ad as-tṛuḥ lbenna n wussan. Xas yeṛwa-tent, ijeṛṛeb-itent akken ilaq : ta ḥlawet, ta qerriḥet, ta tesseḥlay, ta tessendaf, yal ta amek i d-aɣ-d-tṛuḥ. Cfiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiɣ asmi
yeḥbek, i tikkelt tamezwarut ; nwiɣ dɣa d tidet, ad tt-nɣellet. Wi ẓran ? Akka i qqaren medden. Ziɣ anida ḍemɛaɣ tafat, i ufiɣ lehwa tekkat. Hé oui ! Tiqriḥin n wul,
snulfuyent-d leɛyub, nlul-d mebla lɛib, lɛib yettṛaju lexxaṛ. D acu i d-nessukkes i leqrar, ma d win kan i d abrid-is ? Ul-inu d afennan, am nek, neɣ yifi-yi cwiṭ. Din yefṛaḥ, din yennuɣna, din iḥemmel, din yellez seg wayen iɛeddan fell-as. Iiiiiiiiiiiiiiiih ! Ḥemmel neɣ qim, lḥu neɣ qim ; ticki ur iban s ani, yifi-t win igan lqid i uḍar-is…

Tawilayt n Lbeyyeḍ
Tawilayt n Lbeyyeḍ d Tawilayt deg tmurt n Lezzayer. Zedɣen-tt 228 624 n yimezdaɣen. Ma d tajumma-ines tesɛa azal n 78 870 km². Tamanaɣt ines d tamdint n lbeyyeḍ. Tawilayt-a tebḍa ɣef 8 n tdayriwin:
- Tadayra n Buɛlam (Sidi Ɛmer, Buɛelam, Sidi Ṭifur, Stiten)
- Tadayra n Bugṭeb (Tusmulin, Bugṭeb, Lxiter)
- Tadayra n Busemɣun (Busemɣun)
- Tadayra n Brizina (Lɣasul, Brizina, Krakda)
- Tadayra n Cellala (Cellala, Lemḥerra)
- Tadayra n Lebyeḍ Sidi Ccix (Arbaouat (fr) , Ɛin Lewreq, Lebyeḍ Sidi Ccix, Lebnud)
- Tadayra n Lbeyyeḍ (Lbeyyeḍ)
- Tadayra n Ruggaṣa (Cgig, Ruggaṣa, Kaf Leḥmer)

Timeḍrit Tanaddalt n Iqbayliyen d tasuqilt tufrint n Jeunesse Sportive de Kabylie, d Da Lmulud At Mɛammer i gan tasuqilt ar Timeḍrit Tanaddalt n Leqbayel, maca nwala aken menyif awal n Iqbayliyen af Leqbayel imi d win i d awal amaziɣ ufrin, Leqbayel d taruzi n wawal n tarabt القبائل.
Timeḍrit d awal n Imucaɣ(Itargiyen) anamek ines Jounesse s Tefrensist, naɣ الشبيبة s Tarabt, d awal ad naf deg inzi umucaɛen i aran ar deqs n tutlayin, maca aẓar-is d win n imaziɣen n Imucaɣ.
almud daɣ tmeḍrit tessalit daf ull asali, almud daɣ tmeɣri tessalit daf ull adehhi
Anamek-ines :
L’apprentissage en jeunesse est comme la transcription sur un cœur de roche et l’apprentissage en vieillesse est comme la transcription sur un cœur en sable,
Ma d awal Ilmeẓyen i seqdac , ladɣa di tɣamsa anamek-is’’ jeunes ‘’ s Tefransist naɣ شباب s Tarabt.
- Tanaddalt d unti n wawal anaddal, i d-ikan seg awal addal, awal niḍen n imucaɣ anamek-ines adigan(urrar=Jeu s Teqbaylit, اللعب عند القبائل), tura deg yal Amawal n Tmaziɣt ad naf addal i « Sport », Urar i « Jeux », urrar d « jeux s » Teqbaylit.
Anaddal=Sportif=رياضي
Amarrir=joueur=لاعب
- Iqbayliyens tmaziɣt mgal Leqbayel i ilan d awal s Tarabt(القبائل) d awal i d-imalen atseki n Terbaɛt ar tmurt n iqbayliyen.
Ɣar amagraw-agi s uskil n tifinaɣ dagi

"Almend uṭebbaq n yiwellihen uselway n Tegduda, Mas Abdelmadjid Tebboune, Aɣella unnig n yiɣallen iredsanen, aneɣlaf n Temḥaddit Taɣelnawt, yella-d wemcaweṛ akk d tegrawt tussnant n weḍfaṛ n wenfafad kuṛuna (Covid-19) d yemḍebbṛen n tdawsa, aneɣlaf amezwaru, Mas Abdelaziz Djerad, yeddem laṛyuy ɣef laḥsab n wayen yettwaddmen seg yiduba inagduden yerzan aḍfaṛ n teɣẓent tadawsant, iwelmlihen-agi :
1.Abeddel n wakud yerzan akman yellan seg lewhi mraw d yiwen n yiḍ (23) ar temrilt n semmus n tṣebḥit deg wadeg n seddis..

Aselmad d « usemyaddas » llan dagi iwakken ad ssishlen afrires*(aseeddi) n temsirin i terbeet n yinelmaden. Iwakken ad ten-neiwen di lkalafa-a iweeren yerna isean azal, nhegga-d, i yal tamsirt, yiwen n ulqem uslig i yiselmaden, ula d kra n teɣbula Tikadimiyin d tedbalin. Tiɣbula-a ttwaḥerzent s wawal uffir (tasarut) ara d-ssutren iselmaden, s ttawil n Email, i terbeet n “Ad negmu Lwaḥid”.
Ma tesselmadeḍ tarbeet n tezrawt akked Ad negmu Akken, ma tettwelliheḍ ahil n uselmed di tmezdayt-ik neɣ tajmeet-ik tagensant (tadigant) neɣ ma tebɣiḍ ad txelqeḍ tarbeet i tezrawt n wahil n Ad negmu akken, arut-aɣ-d ɣer tansa-a: info@progressonsensemble.com iwakken ad d-tjerrdem iman-nwen wad d-tessutrem awal uffir. Tzemrem daɣen ad d-tarum ɣer tansa-a iwakken ad d-tessutrem alqem uslig i uselmad ma tamsirt i tesselmadem ur telli ara deg usebter n uselmad i icudden ɣer temsirt-nwen.
Ma tettujerdem yerna tessnem tasarut-nwen, tzemrem ad d-tkecmem ɣer teɣbula illan ufella m’ara tettekkim ɣef iseɣwan-a:
Tekki i zzyada n ttfaṣil ɣef Aswir 1 Asebter n uselmad/n usemyaddas i yeenann iselmaden d imwellhen isegmisanen i temsirin n Uswir 1.
Tekki i zzyada n ttfaṣil ɣef Aswir 2 Asebter n uselmad /du usemyaddas i wid isselmaden d imwellhen isegmisanen i temsirin n Uswir 2.

Addad
Addad (ism nns amassnan: Atractylis gummifera) iga yan ummɣay iṭṭafn isnnann, gis yan ujjig amjahdi s uklu anibi, ism nns "Addad" aẓaṛ nns zzɣ tamaziɣt d ifta zzɣ gis s tutlayt taɛṛabt. Dars kigan n ibɣurn gisn mas ar ittussmras i usijji n ukucm d uxamuc d tmuḍan n turin d kigan n tmuḍan yaḍnin slawann akkʷ tid gisnt izdin d uṣmmiḍ...
Ar nwwan iẓuṛan nns d ar ttussan mas ṛwan i yiwriɣ d ustci, d ar ittusmras i usijji n tmuḍan n ugullel d uhistirya, d ad ur nttu mas ifulki i ugjjiḍ d tkuli n udm d ula i tḥbba n tiɛeurma d tisɣi ...
S usgzl amɣay ad n waddad iga yan ummɣay ɣ ggutn ibɣurn .. macc ar ittɣama iga ucrim ur ar ittutci.

Tugna n Djamal Amriou

Yal aseggas, lawan-a, nestuqqut awal ɣef Lwennas. Nettmektay-it-d, nettgerriz-as “tazibba”. D iḍrisen, rnu semḍit, deg yiɣmisen, d tajmilt deg uzeṭṭa n facebook, d ticemmuɛin di tudrin, d timeɣriwin di tdukliwin, d taɣuct-is tetttbeɛziq deg ifurguten…. Lḥasun, ulac tardast, di Tmurt n leqbayel, ur d-nesekfal awal “Rebelle”. Yuklal Matoub ugar n waya, mačči d wa i d aɣbel. D acu kan, ntezzi, ntenneḍ di “ccfawat mécaniques” yettwehhin ɣer deffir. Niɣ ccfawat i uzekka, mačči i uẓekka ! “Ɣer zdat i twehha tmuɣli», i d as-yeqqar Lwennas. D acu akka ara nwali ar zdat ? D tamaziɣt, d tugdut, d tilelliyin… i ɣef yefka umedyaz tarwiḥt-is.
S.O.A

La ittini lectab iqeddsen: « mec tqerrat s uqmu nnec s moulana ƹisa aha tament s wul nnec is-t iskker rebbi zeg imettin han ceggin a ttfukkut » (Tabratt n ruma 10:9).
Ar ittini altu: « Mec illa ca n yun g lmasiḥ hatin lexliqt tujditt ayd iga. Kul isekkinn iqdimen zrin, kulci yaɣul iga ujdid» (Tabratt tis snat n kurintus 5:17).
Ar ittini rebbi altu: « Unna yumenn g memmis n rebbi la ttili ɣurs cchatt g wul nnes. Id unna ur yuminn, rebbi la-t itegga d bu iḥellall iddex ur da ittamen g cchatt n reb
... (4650 chars skipped) ... 
mut n sidna ƹisa :
Ṣṣalib nɣed isigel sin iƹemdan nna ijemƹen g wammas la ttagell digs imujrimen ḥma at-ten nɣen. Sidna ƹisa immut nnig n ṣṣalib ḥma ad-ax iseɣ s idammen nnes (Tabratt n ɣalaṭiya 3:13). Immut g wansa nnex. Nukni ayd istahell lmut iddex neƹṣa rebbi.
Ṣṣalib ɣas ṛṛemz ayd iga i ufukku n lmasiḥ, digs ayd inƹet rebbi lquwwa nnes d tayri nnes i midden kul (Tabratt tamzwarut n kurintus 1:18). Sidna ƹisa isɣa-yax zeg llƹent n cceriƹa allig yusi llƹent nnex nnig n ṣṣalib (Tabratt n ɣalaṭi
... (4650 chars skipped) ...
ehd ujdid) kul nnesen xef lmasiḥ, ku yuk zeg yut n tamnaṭṭ ixeṣṣan (Luqa 1:1-4), annayn imumenn imzwura ad zayden ism n linjil i yism n umḥḍar nna-d yiwin awal zeg sidi rebbi. Amci-d la nttini i lectab n matta linjil n matta, win marqus linjil n marqus, win luqa linjil n luqa, d win yuḥanna linjil n yuḥanna.
Amci-d iddex kul lectab n taḍa tujditt ntta a-g illa uneɣmis-ad d ufruy nnes, aya-d a-xef da ttusemma taḍa tujditt yits n tikkel s wawal n linjil, s umata g tmizar n waƹreben d tin imaziɣen.

Hamliqar Berqa (s tbuniqt : 𐤇𐤌𐤋𐤒𐤓𐤕𐤟𐤁𐤓𐤒, Ḥomliqart Baraq; seg 275 armi d 228 ST) yella d ajiniral aqerṭai yernu d argaz n tsertit, d aqerru n twacult n Wat Berqa, d baba-s n Ḥannibaɛl, Azdurbaɛl d Magun daɣen d aḍewwal n Hasdurbaɛl Aḥeqqi.
Hamliqar yella d aqerru n yiserdasen iqerṭajiyen deg tegzirt n Ṣiqilya seg 247 ST armi d 241 ST, deg ussan ineggura n yimenɣi abuiniqi amenzu. Yeǧǧ iserdasen-is d imenɛanen yernu yelḥeq ad yexdem imenɣi n yigrawen igerrzen mgal yirumaniyen seg Ṣiqilya. Yuɣal-d Hamliqar ɣ)er tmurt-is syin akken mi ḥebbsen amennuɣ deg 241 ST, dɣa imiren i texṣer Qerṭaj imenɣi-ines. Mi yekker uɣewwiɣ n yiceffaren deg 239 ST, yettunefka-as wadeg i wakken ad yennaɣ mgal yiceffaren, yernu netta yerebeḥ deg-s. Hamliqar yella d aqerru ɣef tuffɣa taqerṭajit ɣ)er temcagzirt tibirit deg 237 ST, yuwet ṭam n yiseggasen deg usewseɛ n wayla aqerṭaji deg Sbenyul uqbel ad yemmet deg 228 ST. Yezmer d netta id-yesnulfan akk ayen yexdem mmi-s Ḥannibaɛl deg yimenɣiwen-is.
Tameddurt-is tazwart[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Ciṭ kan i neẓra ɣef umezruy n twacult n Berqa uqbel send abuniqi. Tawacult-a tekka-d seg temdint n Qurina, tella teǧhed maca ur telli ara gar twaculin timezzwura n Qerṭaj akka id-yules Tony Bath mebla ma yuwi-d yid-s iɣbaluyen. Hamliqar yella d ilemẓi n 28 n yiseggasen mi as d-ssawlen i umennuɣ deg Ṣiqliya deg 247 ST. Imiren, yella yesɛa kraḍ n teḥdayin, mmi-s Ḥannibaɛl deg useggas-nni id-ilul.

D tisewham i ikecmen wid akk yeslan, ussan-a iɛeddan, i tmettant n yimdanen iɣerqen deg kra teftisin n twilayt n Bgayet. Ayen yeǧǧan isalli yessexleɛ-iten ugar d mi d-llan yiɣraqen-a zik maḍi skud mazal lḥal semmeḍ i uɛumu, werɛad i d-tewweḍ tsemhuyt n unebdu yeḥman ideg ssenqasen medden azɣal s waman n yilel. Mbeɛd aɣraq amezwaru i d-yellan deg teftist n Ticci, aṭas n lɣaci i iweḥḥden d acu yewwin asfel yemmuten ɣer uɛumu di lawan ideg mazal ahat ttwacɛalen yifurnuyen daxel kra yixxamen. Aya, i
... (103 chars skipped) ... 
yir tamuffirt imi ur tuɣ tetturaǧu ad teḍru deg wussan n tsemhuyt n tefsut. Maca, mi yezri drus n wakud, send ad yeḥbes wawal ɣef uɣraq-nni i d-yeḍran, yennerna-d yisalli amaynut i d-iberrḥen d akken irgazen n Uḥuddu aɣarim, rnan ufan tafekka n urgaz-nniḍen i d-yettwassufɣen d amattan seg teftist n Melbu, di tama n Ssuq n Letnin. Ɣas ma aɣraq n usfel-a, qqaren fell-as kra n medden belli d asehwu i as-t-id-yewwin imi d ɣelluy kan i yeɣli seg nnig yiblaḍen, wiyaḍ nnan daɣen d timenɣiwt i yenɣa ima
... (103 chars skipped) ...
tuget n lɣaci ẓran si tama-nniḍen ahat d lexsas n tɛessast n teftisin i d ssebba tagejdant n yiɣraqen i d-yettilin yal aseggas. Ɣef waya i d-yewwi ad d-nebder tiɣri i d-tger deg twala iɛeddan tmehla n Uḥuddu aɣarim n tmurt n Bgayet i wid yebɣan ad kkin deg temsizzelt n usexdem n yiɛessasen n teftisin. Tefka-d tagnit ihi i waṭas n yilemẓiyen yettgerrizen aɛumuu i wakken ad ṭṭfen imukan n umahil. Ad ilin deg teswiɛin ideg ttwaḥwajen nezzeh i usellek n yimdanen seg tmettant n uɣraq.

Amenzu n yennayer d ixef n useggas ɣer Yimaziɣen. D tawwurt n useggas akken i as-qqaren yimɣaren. Yetta-as-d yal ass 12 deg yennayer n uzemz agraɣlan (seg tlallit n Ɛisa ar ass-a). llan wid i d-yeqqaren, yettas-d deg 13 neɣ 14 deg yennayer.
Acu kan, ɣer taggara, sfugulen-t s waṭas deg wass n wis 12 deg tmurt n Leqbayel. Awal ‘’Yennayer’’, d awal uddis : yen=yiwen ; ayer=aggur (aggur amezwaru). D aggur amezwaru n useggas ɣer yimaziɣen, acu kan mačči d ass asmi tebda tfada (calendrier) n tmaziɣt, 
... (1447 chars skipped) ... 
alt n ugellid Cacnaq, d tayeḍ. Amek i d-tennulfa tfada (calendrier) n yimaziɣen. Tafada tamaziɣt, d ayen i d-yennulfan deg useggas n 1980 sɣur umeɣnas acawi Amar Negadi i yettwassnen s yisem Amar Acawi. Yella umeɣnas-agi i ilulen deg usegas n 1943 deg Tbaten, deg Ugraw n Yimaziɣen (Académie Berbère) deg tmurt n Fransa. Yeqdec deg-s kra n lweqt kan deg yiseggsen-nni 1970.  tmaziɣt. S tuffra akked tmeḥqranit, ɣer uselmed-is deg yiɣerbazen, ɛinani. Yenna umedyaz deg wawal-is :’’rriɣ tajmilt tameqqrant i wid-ak-nni, alef akked tteɛmeyya, i d-ḥesben segmi nettwaɣ. Limmer ur aɣ-t-id-nnin ara, ur neẓri ara d acu-aɣ. Sḥesbet-aɣ-d ar ass-a, wid i d-yeggran yid-s ad nennaɣ. Anwi wigi? D imeqqranen ɣef yimeqqranen, d imecṭaḥ s ddaw Rebbi. Qisset, feṣslet, xiḍet, selset-asen isem i aken-iɛeǧben, fell-asen i d-nettɣenni’’.
Ihi, Aseggas ameggaz ara d-nnini nekni.

Yebda tirza-s si tɣiwant n Tefrit n At Lḥaǧ , anda ibedd ɣer usenfaṛ n lebni n uɣerbaz alemmas B5 deg ulmus n tɣiwant anda lecɣal deg-s sɛan aṭṭas n laɛḍil, d ayen i yerran lwali, ad yefk iwellihen i yemḍebbṛen n tɣiwant d wid teɛna temsalt, i wakken ad ɣiwlen deg uheggi n uɣerbaz –agi i unukcum aɣurbiz i d-itteddun. Deg ussan-a yezrin, i d-berrḥen yiɛeggalen n tiddukla « Itri adelsan n Uqbu », deg usebter-ines n Facebook, ɣef temsizzelt{Concours} n tewlaft{Photos}.
I wakken ad yekki yiwen, ilaq ad yili yezdeɣ deg ugezdu n Bgayet, yerna ad yili yesɛa gar 16 ɣer 30 n yiseggasen deg tudert-is.
Imḍebbṛen n tiddukla « Itri Adelsan n Uqbu », fkan-d kraḍ n yifernan{Trois choix}. Imekki yezmer ad yefren gar : idles Amaziɣ, tawennaḍt neɣ d timeḍrit{Jeunesse}.
Azemz aneggaru i uceggeɛ n tewlafin ɣer tansa n tiddukla [email protected] ad yili i wass n 16 di ɣuct 2020 ɣef 23:59.
Akken daɣ i yesefk ɣef yall imekki neɣ timekkit ad seddun(t) isemawen-nsen(t), tansiwin, d tewsit i fernen deg temsizzelt.

LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Asqamu Unnig i Timmuzɣa (HCA) akked Tnegga n Yisalan n Lezzayer (APS), ad ssuddsen ass n sad (ssebt) i d-iteddun deg tesɣimt n tneggarut-a, yiwen n umyiger n telɣut ɣef usentel n ’’Tamaziɣ akked yimeẓla inagduden’’, s uttekki n yisdawanen akked yimsuɣlen s tihawt n yigensasen n sḍis n yineɣlafen.
Amyiger-a yers deg ubrid n umecwar yerzan asuɣel ɣer tutlayt tamaziɣt n wallalen yemgarden igan deg useggas n 2017 ilan iswi d amsezgi cwiṭ cwiṭ ɣer wayen i d-tenna Tmenḍawt, i ceggren deg furar 2016.
Deg usihar-a, ad tili deg-s yiwet n tɣuri akked uqbal n wamek ara yilin isekkilen n tira yellugnen mi ara yilin yigalisen akked yimuggizen n tedbelt akked useḍru n yisalalen n yimesli i yiznen yerzan imsiklen.

Himalaya
himalaya tga azrar n idurar yzgan g asya ، bḍan izaɣarn n tamtagzirt n ugaraw ahindi ɣaf twrirt n ttibit. dgs aṭṭas sg wafatn nna iɣzzafn g wakal، ylla dgs afa n udrar n ivirist (8,8488 n mitru). llan dgs idurar n himilaya s ugar n 500 n udrar yzri uɣlluy n yal, dgs 7,200 n mitru، dgs awd 14 n wafatn nna yiwḍn ar 8,000 n mitru. iga udrar akunkagu afa amqqran g bṛṛa n asya s uɣlluy n 6,9611 mitr izga g uzrar n idurar n andiz g tamirikt n unẓul .
g iwtta n izrarn n idurar himilaya g ugafa ataram idurar n qraqrm d idurar n hindukuc، g ugafa tawrirt n ttibit، g unẓul azaɣar n ganj ahindi. ylla lfrq jar himalaya xf idurar nna as ysutln ، maca g krq n wakudn .
llan idurar n himilaya g smmust n tmura g asya nttnti : nibal d lhind d butan d ccinwa d bakistan ، .llan dgs aṭṭas n isaffn nna ytwassn g umaḍal maṛṛa، am asif n sind d wasif n lganj d wasif n tsanjbu-brahamutra nna yngin g himalaya، iga ifrḍ n waman amdraw n isaffn ad axxam n nig n 6000 mlyun n ufgan. ylla ɣur idurar n himalaya adɣar amqqran g tadlsiwin n unẓul n asya , acku llan aṭṭas n wafatn g himalaya nna ɣur atig g tahndusit d tabudit.

Tgellu-d twaɣit n tmes s umihi i umaḍal s umata. D tawaɣit i d-yettawin lemḍerra i umdan daɣen, imi deg kra n tamiwin tkeččem ula ɣer tuddar, tessexsar kra ara taf sdat-s. Yal aseggas tḥeggeṣ tiẓegwa, isekla d yimɣan. Ma d ssebbat d tidak dima, ma mačči d timental n ugama, d amdan i yettilin deffir n twaɣit. D igiman n yigeṭṭaren i ireqqen yal anebdu, ur ikeffu ara dɣa alamma berrḥent-d tenmehliwin n uḥuddu aɣarim s yigmaḍ i d-tessegra, ad ggarent tiɣri i leɛqel d leḥder. Dɣa deg twilayt n Wehra
... (37 chars skipped) ... 
uddu aɣarim leḥsab n tjumma i tesserɣ tmes deg unebdu-a s 121 igeṭṭaren, seg umenzu n yulyu 2019 armi d 8 cutamber 2019.
Tenna-d d akken ɣas meqqer wuṭṭun-a, maca ur d-glint ara s txeṣṣarin timeqqranin i izemren ad ḍurrent amdan, acku tuget n tmess i inetren, tella-d deg tẓegwa. Seg tama-s temmeslay-d Massa Ḥalima.Ḥ, timḍebbert n uḥareb, ɣef yimihiyen n tmes, tenna-d 121-agi n yigeṭṭaren, 48 deg-sen d tiẓegwa timeqqranen i yerɣan, 63 n yigeṭtaren deg yimukan ur nelli d tiẓegwa, yexlan seg yimezd
... (37 chars skipped) ...
 amḍan-a ɣer win n yilindi, ad t-naf yuli mliḥ aseggas-a, imi ilindi tenker tmes 13 n tikkal kan, tegla s 12 n yigeṭṭaren, ma d timental ur banent ara”. Tiɣiwanin yenneḍruran s waṭas i tḥuza tmes-a, ad naf Busfer, Msergin, Arzew d Gdeyel. Ma d aggur ideg i tzad s waṭas tmes, d aggur n yulyu, imi tessaweḍ tečča 107 n yigeṭṭaren. Annect-a, yeǧǧa tanmehla-a ad d-tger tiɣri i uḥader, akken ad qqiment tẓegwa cebḥent, ur reqqen ara yisekla ladɣa wid ur d-nettuɣal ara seld timerɣiwt-nsen.
Khaled Achoui

Ass n 3 duǧember yezrin i d ass amaḍalan n umeɛḍur. Ma nemmeslay-d ɣef liḥala-s tinmettit, mazal ar tura yuɣal di rrif, ttwakksen-as seg waṭas n yiseggasen ddeqs n yizerfan igejdanen iɣef ara neɛreḍ ad nessefti awal.
Anda-t uzref i tɣuri?
Ulamma asaḍuf yefka azref i yal aɣerman i tɣuri baṭṭel, tidet teqqar-d mačči akken i tella taluft ɣef yimeɛḍar. Dɣa, aṭas seg-sen i yettuḥettmen ad d-ḥebsen taɣuri war ma iga-asen-d uwanek ttawil amek ad kemmlen. Ama s uxdam n wawwaḍ (l’accessibilité) s tceryul
... (61 chars skipped) ... 
n yiselmaden yettḥerriken ara irezzun s ixxamen i usɣer n yimeɛḍar. Daɣen, ilaq ad d-nini d akken ula d wid yewwḍen ɣer tesdawit, ttidiren uguren d imeqqranen di tudert-nsen n yal ass, abeɛda imi tikwal tekksen-asen ahil n umallal n tudert tinmettit (AVS).
Mazal tajernant di 4 000 n yidinaren
Acḥal n yiseggasen segmi ttnaɣen tddukkliwin, imeɛḍar d yimawlan-nsen i useḥbes n lbaṭṭel d usali n upansyun amayyur n umeɛḍur. Dɣa, ulamma iberreḥ-d unabaḍ d akken ad tali ɣer 10 000 n yidinaren seg umenzu
... (61 chars skipped) ...
taɣen yimeɛḍar ala 4000 n yidinaren.
Tuɛert n ukcam deg tudert tinmettit
Seg yiɣilifen-nniḍen i d-yettemlil umeɛḍur, yal mi ara yeffeɣ tawwurt n uxxam-is, d wid n wawwaḍ ɣer wanida yebɣa ad iruḥ, i uqdaw n ccɣel neɣ i uxeddim. Ugur-a, iḥuza s waṭas imesdurar, imi yewwi-d tili tga-d ddula ahil uzzig n wawwaḍ i temnaḍt-a. Ama d tacrift, d tasreqqest (lbusṭa), d taɣiwant, d taneččit, d tanegga (agence) neɣ d asensu, ur yettaf umeɛḍur abrid i netta, ɣas yefka-as usaḍuf, di tferrawt kan, azref.
M. K.

Agemmay alatini
Agemmay alatini d agemmay yettuseqdac di tira n waṭas n tutlayin. Yekka-d aẓar-is seg ugemmay itruski.
Agemmay alatini yettwura seg uzelmaḍ ɣer ayfus , yesea 26 isekkilen, aṭas n umsasa (adaptations) n ugemmay alatini di tutlayin tiyaḍ (am taqbaylit) sean ugar n 26 isekkilen.
Amezruy[beddel]
Agemmay alatini amezwaru ɣur-s 23 isekkilen, umbeed rnan-as 3 wiyaḍ: J, U, W.
Agemmay alatini ameqqran[beddel]
Agemmay alatini d agemmay iwumi yesean kter isekkilen ger igemmayen, Ṭṭabla deg ukessar seg Unicode 5.0 (Tasiwelt taneggarut).

Bgayet, 23 tuver (SIWEL) – Iḍelli n lexmis ṣṣbeḥ, di temdint n Bgayet, kra n lmitrat kan ɣef uqus n iberdan « quatre chemins » qqbala annar n Belɛelwac, deg webrid n tmacint, teḍra-d yiwet n twaɣit i d yeglan s tmenɣiwt n yiwen n wemdan akked wejraḥ n wemdakel-is.
Tamacint « auto-rail » i d-yusan si Lezzayer tamanaɣt ɣer temdint n Bgayet tḥuza sin yemdanen ayi, yiwen deg-sen yessufeɣ iman deg Ṣbiṭar n Xellil Ɛemran ɣef setta d wezgen n tmeddit, ma d wayeḍ mazal-it di Ṣbiṭar.
A d-nesmekti, d akken iɣalen n laman rzan ɣer wemḍiq anda i d-teḍra tedyant ayi; akken ad nadin ɣef sebba i d-yessegran tawaɣit-ayi.
c.w

‘’Deg ukatar n umennuɣ mgal n usetti akked tinnɣi tuddist, yiwet tsensirt n Tredsa taɣelnawt taɣerfant tubeẓ, deg Lberǧ Baǧi Lmexttar (Tamnaḍt taserdasant tis 6), sin (2) n yimsettiyen ma i umi kksen yiwen n ukamyun, krad (3) n tkerrusin, (7.400) n yilitren n yiserɣan akked (3,6) n yiṭunen n tgella’’, i d-yesseddi uɣbalu-nni.
Tisensirin nniḍen s tallelt n yiferdisen n Temsetla taɣelnawt ‘’ubẓen, deg Wehran, akked Tlemsan (Tamnaḍt taserdasant tis 2), mraw d yiwen (11) n yimsettiyen i umi kksen (66,03) n yikilugramen n lkif akked (500) n tɛeqqacin n leɛqel’’.

At Menṣur
At Menṣur (zikenni ɣɣaren-as daɣen Tawrirt) d yiwet taɣiwant n Tmurt Leqbayel deg twilayt n Tubiret. Tezga-d ar 46 km seg weɣrem n Tubiret ed 101 km seg weɣrem n Bgayet.
Tarakalt[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
At Menṣur d taɣiwant icudden ɣer tɣiwant n Ccerfa, Imceddalen, Aḥnif d Raffur (Iwaquṛen). Ur teggug ara daɣen seg tiɣwanin tiqbayliyin n Burǧ Bu Aɛririǧ d twilayt n Bgayet.
Tuddar[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Llan 4 tuddar deg At Menṣur :
- Tawrirt
- Tiɣilt neɣ Iḥasiwen
- At Buɛli
- Arruḍa
Tadamsa[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Ager (tafellaḥt) igerrez deg wakal n At Menṣur. Llan daɣen aṭas n azara (minérais) i seqdacen.

Aṭṭas n yewdan xsen ad lemden ca n lluɣa d jdid. Niɣ ad ṭewwren lluɣ i ssawalen. Nhara niwi-dd setta n tmeslayin i zi tzemmard ad tdewled tɣeyyazed lluɣa i tlemmded.
1- siɣi, wer ttbedda
Lebda ttegged di lbal ad tlemded ca n lluɣa d jdid. Tbeddid tetticed ddɛen i welmad. Maca xmi ttacid ifadden bdan ad wḍan, ccɣel itteqsiḥ, lexdenni ttraḥ ɣana! D tenni d lweqt i di ixessa ad tsiɣid, ad tfekkred lebda mayemmi texsed ad tlemded lluɣa nni. I ca n Lxedmet d jdid?! I wemsawal aked yewdan d jdid?! Min
... (586 chars skipped) ... 
m)
Tzemmard ad tegged tucrikt/ucrik n welmad, a das-teslemded lluɣa tessawaled, a zzeg-s tlemded lluɣa-nnes (mala tucrikt/ucrik-a yessawal-itt). Amek tzemmard ad tcerked aked t*inni ilemmden beɛda, ij ad itsekkad awal i wenneɣni.
4- Furrej deg filmen, sell i ipudkasten
Mala wer tufid wi ked ɣa-tessiwled, futrej deg Ifilmen tesled i ipudkasten, ina ttɛawanen ad tlemded tiwinas (phrases) kemlent deg umkan n yiwalen waha. Amek tettmerni tyacit aked lluɣa, minzi xmi nettesla i wawal, nɛeqqel x-as ml
... (586 chars skipped) ...
n iraqqen n wemṣawad (Instagram, Facebook…), tina nzemmar a tent-nessexdem a deg-s nessen iwdan ttarin s lluɣa nxes a nelmed. A kid-sen nettari.
Mala tzemmard, ad traḥed ad tesseɛdid ij n 6 chur di tmurt mani ssawalen lluɣa-nni. Ataf ad tdewled tɣeyyzed-tet. Xelli neccin irifiyyen ɣer-neɣ aqemmum yessufuɣ-dd marra tutlayin n dduniyt, wer nettif amxumbel deg isekkilen. Suya ixess-aneɣ a nezɛem waha, wer nettɣimi neqqen ɣer tefransist d taɛrabt waha. Mɣir ijt, Tamaziɣt-nneɣ ixessa wer deg-s nsmeḥ.

Ass-a, yezzi-d umulli wis 34 n « Tefsut imaziɣen » n 1980; d usmekti wis 13 n « Tefsut taberkant » n 2001.
Yal tafsut tettawi-d izeǧǧigen-is, yal tasuta trennu-d amennuɣ-is ɣef tutlayt d yidles nneɣ, ɣef tlelli d izerfan nneɣ.
Seg Cacnaq ar Masensen ; seg Diheyya ar Faḍma n Summer ; seg Ṭawes Ɛemṛuc ar Mulud At Mɛemmeṛ, seg Meɛtub Lwennas ar Warrac n tefsut Taberkant, ……….. Tamaziɣt mazal-itt tedder. Am ugerruj, wa yettaǧǧa-tt-id i wayeḍ ar almi d-tewweḍ ass-a ɣer nneɣ.
Aṭas i d-skeflen imezwura, nekni ass-a ilaq ad tt-nesefti akken ad tecbu timeslayin nniḍen.
Ilaq ad s-d-yuɣal wazal di tmurt-is. Ɣef waya ad nger tiɣri i wid teɛna temsalt akken Tamaziɣt:
– ad tt-rren d tutlayt tunṣibt.
– ad tt-sɣarayen deg meṛṛa iɣerbazen n tmurt.
– ad s-xedmen timkerḍit deg uɣerbaz nneɣ.
– ad s-rnun akud deg wahil n leqraya.
– ad ɣ-d-rnun iselmaden n tmaziɣt.
Nesaram tiɣri nneɣ, ur tɣelli ara ar wannu!!
“Tamaziɣt-nni d-yefrurin di ṣṣeḥ
Ar ɣer-sen netni, telha kan i cḍeḥ”
(L. Meɛtub)
Tudert i Tamaziɣt !!
Agraw n inelmaden
Aɣerbaz Alemmas Lɛerbi Mezani
At-Yanni, 20 Yebrir 2014.

Poésie
Ečč ad ixelleṣ mmi k
Yiwen wemɣaṛ iâada zdat ṛistuṛa. Iwala uran d dina : « Ečč ad ixelleṣ mmi k ».
Amɣaṛ nni ur yaâdil ara neţţa d mmi s. Dɣa ifṛeḥ.
Inna yas : as assekneɣ i wemcum nni. Iffeɣ abrid. Assa ad ixelleṣ.
Ikcem ar ṛistuṛa nni, iqqim ar tabla, imuqel l kaṛa nni, dɣa kwmanda a tekmandiḍ.
Awi d ta, awid ta, alarmi ičča ayen ara ččen âacṛa medden.
U yerna ikwmanda ayen ɣlayen maḍi...
Mi ifuk, iṛwa, ikker ad iffeɣ.
Issawel as d bab n ṛistuṛa nni. Inna yas
-Aâni a ţṛuḥeḍ ur teţxlliseḍ ara?
Irra yas umɣaṛ nni :
-Mi d yusa mmi, ad ixelleṣ.
Dɣa bab n ṛistuṛa nni ibbwi yas d leḥsab, imir nni :
-Ih, ẓṛiɣ mi d yusa mmi k ad ixelleṣ. Maâna xelleṣ iyi d, kečč, ayen akw yečča baba k. Atan leḥsab anect ilat...
muqṛan i âazag Blois, le 03 février 2011

Ɣef wakken i t-id-twekked
twacult n ucennay Idir,
