akken i yebɣa netta.
deg Fransa. Seg wasmi yemmut unaẓur ameqqran Idir (2 deg maggu 2020) i d-tenna twacult-is d akken ad yemḍel deg Fransa, ‘’D wa i d lebɣi-s’’. Ha-t-an ihi tedda-as deg lebɣi imi yemḍel ass-nni n larebɛa, azizwu, 13 deg maggu 2020, deg tmeqqbert Père-Lachaise deg Pari. Deg ulɣu i d-tesuffeɣ twacult-is, ass n ttlata, 12 deg maggu 2020, tenna-d ‘’Tamḍelt n ucennay Idir, tella-d deg Fransa anda ttilin warra
... (34 chars skipped) ... 
as ulamma yessarem deg tazwara i wakken ad tili temḍelt-is deg taddart anda i ilul. Ihi, tawacult-is, texdem kan ayen i iwulmen, tquder asirem-is,ur tezmir ara ad d-tekk nnig lebɣi n ucennay Idir’’. Ɣef waya dɣa i d-tessuter twacult-is seg wid i t-iḥemmlen i wakken ad qaddren, am nutni, lebɣi n unaẓur. I usmekti, aṭas n yimdanen i yessarmen tamḍilt-is deg wakal n lejdud-is mačči deg lɣerba, ‘’am wakken d imenfi’’, i d-walan kra. Ɣef waya dɣa, i yuzzel waṭas n wawal deg yiẓeḍwa inmettiyen. Yal wa
... (34 chars skipped) ...
n ucennay d wid yellan mgal asirem-a. Akken yebɣu yili, ad yeqqim d azamul am netta, am Slimane Azem, El Hasnaoui d wiyaḍ xas meḍlen berra n Tmurt. I usmekti, deg tmeqqbert Père-Lachaise, ttwameḍlen aṭas n wudmawen i imechuren deg ddunit, yecban Pierre Abélard (1079-1142), Edmond About (1828-1885), Augustin Gabriel d’Aboville (1773-1820), Augustin Marie d’Aboville (1776-1843), François Marie d’Aboville (1730-1817), Nicolas Abramtchik (1903-1970), Étienne Aignan, (1773-1824) d wiyaḍ.

Agraw n Ṣummam d yiwen n ugraw i d-yessuddes Tirni n Weslelli Aɣelnaw (FLN) i d-yellan s tuffra deg tallit n tagrawla n Lezzayer, yettwassuddes seg 13 ar 20 ɣuct 1956. Agraw-agi xedmen-t deg taddart n Iɣban d Ifri, tura di tɣiwant n Uwzellagen, tamnaḍt n Leqbayel (Lezzayer).
Yella-d ugraw n Ṣummam akken ad yessebded yerna ad yessuddes tagrawla, ad as-yefk llsas aɣelnaw yerna ad yeḥrez taluft tazzayrit ɣer timura n umaḍal.
Agraw-a yessemlal-d imḍebbren igejdanen n Tagrawla: Lɛarbi Ben Mhidi (tamn
... (294 chars skipped) ... 
lƐid (tamnaḍt tamezwarut) ur yezmir ara ad yili deg wegraw-agi, imi yemmut deg yimenɣi 5 n wayyuren uqbel waya. Amar Ait Chikh yemmut daɣen uqbel agraw-a s tẓa (09) wussan.
Yerna tamagla tabeṛṛanit, ay yesselwi Ahmed Ben Bella, ur tezmir ara ad taweḍ ɣer wakal-nni.
Rray n ussuddes n temlilit-agi deg Ifri d win icudden imi taddart-a tezga-d deg tlemmast n yidurar d yiberdan iweɛṛen. Idurar d isekla ttawin armi d tiẓgi n Akfadou. Aya yettaǧǧa tarewla ma yella yeḍra-d aẓdem sɣur aedaw aroumi.
Seg w
... (294 chars skipped) ...
(CNRA) d Useqqamu n Usemyuddes d Usefɛel (CCE).
Agraw –agi, iswi-nsen ad siwḍen ad yili udabu aserti: yal yiwen d acu ara yeṭṭef d wacu ara iseddu. Ama deg tsertit, tujjya, isalen, asefrek d waṭas n yiḥricen icudden ɣer tmetti tazzayrit sumata mgal acengu afransis. Ilaq ad ilint seddis (06) n lwilayat, yal tawilayt ad tebḍu ɣef ukkuz (04) n tamiwin, yal tama s ukkuz n yiḥricen. Sɛan tin iwumi qqaren lkatiba (bataillon) d 120 iserdasen (hommes armés). Yebɣa ad iseggem yakk iḥricen s wudem aserti.

Seg wid yellan ur ɣrin, neɣ ur asen-d-tsaḥ tegnit ad xedmen deg walbeɛd n yimeḍqan, deg tɣiwanin n Tsexriwt ed Ayt Smaɛel ladɣa, aṭas n yilemẓiyen i nwala ferḥen ayendin ussan-a yezrin, beyynen-d asirem d ageɛmir segmi yettwaldi s wudem unsib Unammas n Usileɣ Asadar (Centre de Formation Professionnelle) n Lberj n Mira, taɣiwant n Tsexriwt, sɣur uneɣlaf i teɛna taluft, ddurt yezrin. Aṭas-aya, yuɣ lḥal, netta yettraǧu ad yettwaldi unammas-a ideg ttwassaramen yimeḍqan n uqeddic, wanag atan almi d tazwara n useggas-a amaynut i yeldi tiwwura-s. Ad d-nesmekti dakken ar tura mačči aṭas n tgezmiwin (sections) i yellan deg unammas-a. Ala snat – taxeyyaḍt, ed ubnaw – di leɛḍil ad d-nnulfunt tiyaḍ deg teɣzi n wakud ɣef wawal n yiwen seg yimḍebbren n tɣiwant. Ar tura llant kan snat n tgezmiwin i wid yebɣan ad yelmed, maca ad ilint tiyaḍ sey-a ɣer sdat. Ula d mass aneɣlaf yessuter ad d-ssekren ilemẓiyen deg yiḥricen swayes ara afen axeddim s teshel. Kra n rray inuḥen, yeqqar-d belli anammas-a ad yessenqes xilla seg lmeḥna n wid ur nettaf axeddim. Ihi, i win yebɣan ad ijerred iman-is din, ilaq-as kan ad yelḥem ɣer tmehla-s akken ad iẓer d acu d ikwaɣḍen i as-ilaqen. Ɣas tura yella kra yettmaggan daxel-is, meɛna aya yettili-d di leɛḍil kan, imi akken nessaweḍ neẓra, aseggas amenzu ad yebdu seg ctember i d-iteddun.
Mhenni Xalifi

idi Ṛebbi i t-isbedden mi s-yenna : Kečč d Mmi, d nekk i k-id-yefkan ɣer ddunit ass-a .

7 Asm’akken yella Lmasiḥ di ddunit s ṣṣifa n wemdan, acḥal i gedɛa, acḥal i gḥellel s nnhati d imeṭṭawen Sidi Ṛebbi i gzemren a t-isellek si lmut. Ɣef ddemma n ṭṭaɛa-ines, yețwaqbel.

ezmer a d-nernu aṭas ɣef wannect-agi meɛna d ayen i weɛṛen i wsefhem, axaṭer tweɛṛem i lefhama.

Ussan agin izrin, llant-ed tifranin n usveddu umezawar n at uyeffus d at tlemmast ar tifrant n tselwit n 2017 di Fransa. D François Fillon id-svedden imi izwar s waṭas Alain Juppé di tiremt tis snat. Akavar anelmay mazal ur ivan ara yixef is. Wa iqqar d aselway n tegduda n wassa François Hollande wa iqqar ahat ad Manuel Valls ara irnun ar tama n wid id-ivedden yagi am Arnaud Montebourg. Maca yiwen kan ara d ivedden ad iqazem François Fillon, Marine Le pen d Jean-Luc Mélenchon.

Akken kan yecceḍ wemdan di tazwara, Ṛebbi ur t-yeǧǧa ara akkenni mebla lweɛd. Yeqsed si tazwara ad yefk amsellek. Deg ixf wis tlata di Laṣel n ddunit, issers-d lweɛd-agi n umsellek ara d-yasen. ( Laṣel n ddunit 3: 15 aked 21). Mi yfaq wemdan belli yecceḍ, yeɛreḍ ad iṣṣer iman-is s ifassen-is, s lecɣal-is. Ma d Ṛebbi, netta yessels-as, iṣṣer-it s weglim, s wesfel amezwaru yakan. Ilaq imiren ad yemmet uɣersiw seg ara s-d-yefṣel aglim-nni i s ara t-yeṣṣer. Ayagi yakan d tikci sɣur Ṛebbi, d asfel i 
... (691 chars skipped) ... 
tefk aẓar ɣer zdat, ɣer ddunit meṛṛa, ɣer leǧnas nniḍen. Degmi azal nniḍen ara d-yegmun si lweɛd-agi, d azal i yal amdan ara yerren lettkal-ines di Lmasiḥ, i leslak. Ayagi a t-nwali yakan di Lasel n ddunit deg ixf wis 12. Lmasiḥ a d-yas si dderya n Yebṛahim. Akka i yura di Tira iqedsen belli, Yebṛahim ad yuqel d lbaraka i ddunit meṛṛa.
Iseflawen meṛṛa i s d-yumeṛ Ṛebbi, i wegdud n wat Isṛail, ad ilin d izamulen n wesfel-nni i d-yewɛed si zik. Ad yas iwakken ad yettunefk d asfel ɣef ddemma n yemd
... (691 chars skipped) ...
 seg at Isṛail, alammi i d-iban Lmasiḥ uɣalen ɛeqlen-t s tidett di zzman-is. S teflest-nni ara ttuselken daɣen wid meṛṛa iɛacen uqbel Lmasiḥ axaṭeṛ llan ssaramen deg-s ɣas akken ur t-walan ara di zzman-nsen. Am umedya n Yebṛahim d wiyyiḍ. Am akken daɣen ara nefhem d akken leslak s liman mačči s lecɣal ara yexdem wemdan. Yebṛahim yerra lettkal-ines deg ayen akken i s-yewɛd Ṛebbi, mačči deg ayen ara yexdem netta s ufus-is neɣ s ixemmim-is. D ayen ara nɣar di tebṛatt i wat Ṛuman ( At Ṛuman 4: 1-3).

TASEKLA (SIWEL) — Simmal yettnerni uswir n tira s Teqvaylit, acku iseggasen-a ineggura, aṭas n yilemẓiyen d tlemẓiyin refden(t) imru-nsen(t) u veg-sen(t) ad ssidren(t) tutlayt-nsen(t), gar-asen ilemẓi Ḥusin Luni.
Deg ussan yezrin i d-yuYal yilemẓi Ḥusin Lunis s wungal-is wis sin, i wumi yefka azwel « AsebbaY », i d-yeffYen Yer tezṛigin Richa Elsam n twilayt n Tizi Wezzu.
Ḥusin Luni, d mmi-s n taddart n At Ʃṭella, i yettafaren lɛerc n At Yeḥya Musa. Yewsa-d Yer tudert deg ass n 11 furar 1983.
Ḥus

temliliyin i d-yettilin di temnaḍin yemgaraden di tmurt (Adrar n fad, Aqvu, At Ziki, d wanda-nniḍen). Ungal-is amenzu yessazṛeg-it-id deg 2013.
Yewwi arraz amenzu deg tezṛigt tamenzut i d-tessuddes tesveddit takanadit Tiregwa, arraz n tullisin Belɛid At Ʃli n useggas 2013. Akken daY i yefka azal i tsuqilt. D aya i t-yewwin ad yer « Le Prophète » n Ğebran Xalil Ğebran Yer teqvaylit.

Kunwi kunemti yettnadin idlisen-is, ad tentafem(t) ttnuzen deg tnedlisin n Vgayet, Tuviret, Tizi wezzu, d wanda-nniḍen.
Idlisen i d-yessuffeY ar tura:

- « AsebbaY » ungal, deg 2017.

Tawerga
Tawerga d yiwet n tiɣiwanin n Tamurt Leqbayel, tezga-d ar ugmuḍ uggug n ugezdu n Bumerdas.
Tarakalt[beddel]
Tawerga tella gar uzaɣar n Sabaw d yidurar.
Llant kra n tuddar deg tɣiwant : Beni Attar, Lǧemɛa, Bouhbachou, Budciha, Tingrin, Lqudiyya, Mazer, Laɣdayer, Wad Hlal. Imezdaɣ ttmeslayen aṭas s teɛrabt gar-asen (d zdi muḥ).
Amezruy[beddel]
Deg uyyur n yennayer 1985, Tawerga tuɣal taɣiwant. Tella zik d taddart kan di tɣiwant n Laɛzib N Ccix (umi qqaren Baɣliya ass-a) deg utaram.
Tadamsa[beddel]
At Tawerga ggan aṭas n tekessawt di tɣiwant, zzit uzemmur dinna tela (tesɛa) aṭas n wazal, tella tafellaḥt deg idurar.

Ajdid deg tira
Tafda n tfellaḥ n Semmani Akli
Deg wussan-agi iɛeddan, i d-yessuffeɣ Mass Semmani Akli yiwet n tefda n tfellaḥt n tmurt n leqbayel, yessuffeɣ-itt-id ɣertezrigin “Aures Emballages” n Braa Ben Khedda. Iger-d deg-s, aṭas n tugniwin i d-isenfalayen tudert d tɣerma akked wansayen n tmurt n tmazɣa. Llant deg-s ttsawer n kra n yigelliden imaziɣen yecban: Dyhia d Massnssen, akked sin n yirgazen yiwen d agrawliw wagi d Abane Remdane, wayeḍ d azamul n tmussni wagi d Mulud Mɛemmri. Yal tasemhuyt, yefka-d akk ansayen xeddmen medden deg-s s tugniwin. Yefka-d diɣen ussan n ddurt, wid n wagguren, tinilwin s tmaziɣt, yal tasemhuyt yenna-d azemz melmi tbeddu d melmi tettfaka. Ad d-nesmekti belli, Mass Semmani Akli d mmi-s n Trihant, yettabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Boudjima. D wagi i d amahil-is amezwaru deg unnar n usizreg, tura akka ha-t-an la yettheggi yiwen n udlis ideg ara d-isefhem s wuzig tafda-agi, d wacu xeddmen medden deg yal tasemhuyt n useggas.
Ghani Amazigh

TLEMSAN – Akarnaval ansayan n Ayrad (izem), i sfuggulen yal aseggas deg temnaḍt n Bni Snus i d-yezgan deg wazal n kuẓ n tmerwin n yikilumitren ɣer unẓul utrim n Tlemsan, d yiwet n tedyant tagejdant i yes-s ɣeḍmen amenzu n Yennayer, aseggas Amaziɣ.
Tameɣra-a taɣerfant taqburt i yettwaɣeḍmen s yimyiten i yefkan azar deg umezruy aqbur n temnaḍt n Bni Sbus, deg tallit n yimgura i gan warraw n tmurt, iṛumaniyen, inumidiyen akked yiferɛunen, i d-yenna Mass Mohamed Saridj, d yiwen n umesnemdan.
D ameskar n yiwet n tṣekka ilan azwel : "Verveine fanée" (Uḥirec asellaw), yesseddi-d Mass Saridj dakken asfugel n krad wussan yemseḍfaren yeɣḍem rrbeḥ n ugellid Cacnaq ɣef ferɛun Ramses II. Imgaruyen-a slalen-d, ɣef wakken yettwali, akarnaval Ayrad (izem), i ilan azamul n rrbeḥ n talwit.

Kenza Faraḥ
Kenza Faraḥ, d tacennayt taqbaylit, tlul ass n 8 yulyu 1986 deg Bgayet, tcennu RnB, hip-hop akked pop s tutlayt tafṛansist.
Seg 2007 ɣer 2012, Kenza faraḥ tezzenz ugar n 500 000 n yiḍebsiyen.
TameddurtẒreg
Kenza Faraḥ Maɛuc, tekker-d deg wasun wis 15 deg yizenqan n ugafa n temdint n Marsey, tebda txeddem timeɣriwin timecṭaḥ deg yizenqan, tettekki deg temzazzalin n ccna deg yixxamen n yilmeẓyen, atg. Sakkin Kenza Faraḥ Maɛuc temlal-d akked yemfarasen i s-yefkan tagnitt ad tessekles kra n tezlatin deg ustudyu, gar-asent: Mon ange (lmalayek-iw); Trésor (agerruj) akked Il m'a trahi (yexdeɛ-iyi).
Anect-a yerra-d tamuɣli n yemdanen ɣer tama-s, d acu i tt-yeǧǧan testenya ɣef usufeɣ n yiwen n walbum deg ctamber 2006.

Lqist-ad tettubna xef winna-x qqisen innigan nna nẓanin s wallen nnesen g tudert n sidna ƹisa imcinna-s tettuari g linjil n matta, d win marqus, d win luqa, d win yuḥanna. Da tetteqqis meryem tamejdalit nna xef inna lectab n rebbi tga tamesstefeṛt n sidna ƹisa. Tedda ad-ax teqqis s wul nnes d s ummendat lqist taṛslit n tudert n sidna ƹisa nna ikkan alfayn n useggwas aya-d. G lfilm-ad yan lmumttil da itegga amm sidna ƹisa. Mɣar ur illi awd yan lmumttil nna iwatan ad ig aya-d, mcan ituag uya-d ḥma a nnfru tudert n sidna ƹisa aha nawi zziks lfaytt.

Maâtkas
Asuddes n yiwen n wass n tussna deg uḥric n lɣella n uzemmur
Ad d-suddsen srabes n tfellaḥt n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa, ass n ttlata 4 deg waggur n cutember 2018, yiwen n wass n tussna deg uḥric n uzemmur d wayen i icudden yakk ɣer usafar-agi agejdan deg tdamsa n temḍiqt n Leqbayel. D leqdic ara yebdun ɣef 9h n ssbaḥ deg Uxxam n yelmeẓyen n tɣiwant. Ad sidren ass-agi n tussna imussnawen n srabes n tfellaḥt n ugerzu n Tizi-Uzzu (DSA) d imussnawen n uselmad n tfellaḥt n Sidi Aiche n ugerzu n Bgayet, aṭas n temsal i icudden ɣer lɣella n uzemmur ara yilin deg ttiɛad. Gren tiɣri srabes n tfellaḥt n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa i yifellaḥen d tddukkliwin n tɣiwant akken ad ḥedren i wass-agi n tussna. D tagnit i yefellaḥen, ad sfaydin seg tmussniwin yemgaraden yeɛnan aḥric n uzemmur, ama seg wudem n tmetti, tadmsa neɣ tussna. Uqbel yal tasemhuyt n ulqaḍ n uzemmur, ttheggin-d srabes n tfellaḥt aṭas n leqdicat deg uswir n uwelleh d uḥesses n yifellaḥen ɣef temsal yeɛnan azemmur.

Buylmawn nɣ Bilmawn (illa mad as ittinin Buylmawn buydmawn) tga yat tfugla tamaziɣt ar ittili ɣ kra n tsgiwin ɣ Lmɣrib slawann akkʷ ɣ tsga n Sus-Massa, tga Dcayra tamdint lli akkʷ sis ittussan. Askka n wass n tfaska, ar ttili ɣ tmizar n Sus Amqqran yat tmyurt lli ittwassann s Buylmawn. Iknna ɣrsn middn, Ar smunant tazzanin ilmawn n waɣaḍ nɣ win i

LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Ttwawekkdent-d kuẓet n tmaḍ d yiwet (401) n tejṛa timaynutin n unfafad bu uqacuc, 287 n tujjyiwin d 6 n tmettanin deg 24 n yisragen ineggura deg Lezzayer, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna, ass n usimwas deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, umutlay n Tseqqimt Tussnant n Uḍfar n Umhaz n Tkaɣreft n Unfafad bu Uqacuc, Aduktur Djamel Fourar.
Aɣrud n tejṛa d-yettwawekkden yewweḍ ɣer 41.068, gar-asen 401 n tejṛa timaynutin, neɣ 0,9 n tejṛa i yal 100.000 n yimezdaɣen deg 24 n yisragen, am wakken ay mmuten 1424 n yimdanen seg waḍḍan-a seg wasmi ay d-yebda deg Lezzayer yernu jjin 28.874, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna Uduktur Fourar deg umyager ayalas n tɣemsa ay d-yellan ɣef umhaz n tkaɣreft n unfafad bu uqacuc.
Seg yidis niḍen, 17 n twilayin aydeg d-ttwawekkdent gar 1 d 9 n tejṛa, 16 niḍen ttwawekkdent-d deg-sent ugar n 10 n tejṛa, deg wakud aydeg 15 n twilayin aydeg ur d-tettwawekked ula d yiwet n tejṛut, ɣef wakken ay d-tebder tecrawt-a.
Seg tama niḍen, 49 n yimuḍinen ay yellan, imir-a, deg usesfer aneẓẓaw, ɣef wakken ay d-yerna Uduktur Fourar.
Deg tgara, iwekked-d umasay-a dakken tagnit tasenbayyurant yellan imir-a deg tmurt d tin ay d-iḥettmen ɣef yal aɣerman ad yerr lwelha-nnes yernu ad iqader ilugan n wuɣus d umgugu afekkan, am wakken ay d-yesmekti dakken yessefk ad qadren medden asekmen yernu ad lsen tigelmusin.

Deg udlis-a ay d-yeffɣen ɣer teẓrigin n Casbah, yura-d Mass Djinnit ɣef yiswaɣ yellan deg Maputo, deg Muzambik, deg 11 Yulyu 2003, deg Tqacuct n Tdukli Tafriqit. « Yella-d uzbu d ameqran deg Maputo, maca aneggaf-nni sɛeddan-t ass-nni yakan. Seg wakken iḥuza-iyi waya armi ay d-uriɣ aneqqis aydeg ara awen-d-gelmeɣ ugar tiɣersawin n yiqburen akken ad ẓrent tsutwin ay d-itteddun azal n ubrid d-yettwazegren (i uḍman n yizerfan i tsednan ».
« Negguccel ad tent-nalel (tisednan) akken ad kemmlent amennuɣ-nsent arma kksent-d akk izerfan-nsent ummiden akken ad ilint d tineblagin yegdan d yirgazen « , ɣef wakken ay d-iwekked, deg wakud aydeg tameṭṭut tafriqit ad tesfugel ass-nnes agraɣlan ass n 31 Yulyu.
I lmend n waya, tenna-d tselwayt tityupit Sahle-Work Zewde dakken adiplumati-a yeddem mennaw n tsentayin i lmend n tgadda gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut d temlilt n tmeṭṭut d usmal n talwit d tɣellsit asmi ay yella d adiplumati deg Tuddsa n Tdukli Tafriqit d Yiɣlanen Yeddukklen.
Deg udlis-nnes, Djinnit yeḥka-d amek ay yettwasmel uneggaf n Maputo ɣef yizerfan n tmeṭṭut deg Tefriqt d lḥif ay teṛwa tmeṭṭut deg yiɣrem akked wamek ay tella Zzayer akken kan tewwi azarug.
D aya daɣ ay yeǧǧan taselwayt tityupit ad tfareṣ tagnit akken ad terr tajmilt i tsednan tizzayriyin yernu tenna-d dakken « nnuɣent ɣer yidis n yirgazen deg umennuɣ i uslelli n Zzayer ay yefkan tiɣersawin d timeqqranin am Djamila Bouhired, Hassiba Ben Bouali, Zohra Drif d waṭas n tsednan niḍen ».

Amyag
Kra n tɣawsiwin ɣef wemyag
« Amyag d awal ifettin i lmend n wudem ». Dda Lmulud
Amyag yesskan tigawt nexdem, taɣara neɣ addad n kra tɣawsa. Akka, amyag di tmaziɣt yebḍa ɣef sin isufar:
amyag amagnu, yemmal dacu yexdem (neɣ ara yexdem) umeggay, am: yeffeɣ weqcic ; ssiwel i gma-k ; a d-yawi lɛar... amyag n tɣara, yemmal-d amek iga umeggay, neɣ addad-is, am: yugar ucerrig tafawet ; yettiwriɣ wudem-is ; ɣezzifit aṭas...
Amyag ifetti s:
talɣa tilawt: yella wayen i ɣef d-nettmeslay; neɣ talɣa ti

yella umeggay d amassaɣ, amedya: d argaz-nni i d-yusan ; tusa-d tmeṭṭut-nni yettun mmi-s...
Amaɣun d armeskil, ur ifetti wara, ur yettbeddil ara s ubeddel n tewsit neɣ n wemḍan. Yezmer ad yili d ilaw: inudan (izri), ara inadin (imal). Neɣ d ibaw: ur nezmir (izri), ur nzemmer ara (imal). tazelɣa n tnila
Nesseqdac tazelɣa n tnila d/n i wakken a d-nmel s anda neɣ ansa i d-tekka tigawt.
Tazelɣa d tettweǧǧih tigawt ɣer win i d-yettmeslayen, amedya: iruḥ-d iḍelli (iruḥ ɣer win i d-yettmeslayen).

taggayt tanejṛumt tagejdant i ɣef tvedd tefyirt. Di teqvaylit (tamaziɣt s umata), talɣa taḥerfit n umyag d anaḍ, deg udem wis sin asuf. Yis-s i d-tettili tekcimt deg usegzawal. Ad neṭṭef amedya n umyag aru:

Ɛecra n iseggusa zi mani yemmut García Márquez i yeksin tasemɣurt n Nobel, maca zegga ttyarita issufeɣ-d ijjen wungal wer t-ikemmel ca minzi ixecc-d x-as lehlak.
Deg wussan-nnes imeggura, yenna i tarwa-nnes ila ixess ad cerrgen wungal-nni.
Maca bedden-as deg wudem i baba-tsen, fesren-t, semman ayenni d ijjen “lxedmet n lɣedran”.
Ungal-nni qqaren-as “di tɣuct a nemẓar”, yegga ad yaweḍ merra tisendlisin deg umaḍal di 12 zi mars n useggʷas-a.
D ijjen wungal d aquḍaḍ ittakkʷaḍ jar 100 d 120 n tafart
... (1723 chars skipped) ... 
bal Pera, wenni yuran tunɣilt tameggarut zeg wungal n “di tɣuct a nemẓar”: “tanẓert tameqqrant di ‘tira n ijjen wungal wer isili’ netta a newwec aweqqer ameqqran n lxedmet n Gabriel García Márquez.”
Manaya ila yella d ijjen udenni d ameqqran. Yenna i BBC Mundo: “wer dayi-ttuɣi ixess ad rniɣ ula d ijjen wawal ɛad”.
Pera ila yella d ameddukel n Garcia, ila lebda yeqqar-as maḥend ad isala wungal-nnes.
Ibda ittari dag-s deg useggʷas n 2004, maca deg useggʷas n 2011, yebda ittettu, zi senni wer iqqim
... (1723 chars skipped) ...
 zeg ijjen umeddukel-nnes umi qqaren Max Brod ad yessekmeḍ merra tira-nnes. Maca jar 1925 d 1935 yefser Max Brod merra lexdayem-nnes.
- Yetter Vladimir Nabokov zi temɣart-nnes ad tessekmeḍ adlis-nnes ameggaru “iẓuran n Lulita”, mani ttuɣa yemmut qbel ma ad t-isala, maca xelli amenni mmi-s ifser lexdemt-nnes awerni tlatin n iseggusa.
- Yetter wemdyaz arumani Virgile ad cerrgen tiwriqin min xef yira “énéide” minzi ttuɣa itteggʷed wer ittsili lxedmet-nnes.
Tira: Yasmin Rufo d Santiago Vanegas, BBC.

« S uneɣni d ameqqran ay iyi-d-yewweḍ yisali n tmettant n tmeṛḥumt tanaẓurt Chafia Boudraa ay yewwi Bab-nnes ɣer yidis-nnes », ɣef wakken ay d-yura uselway n tegduda deg yizen-nnes n uɛezzi.
« Deg teswiɛt-a tuqriḥt, aql-aɣ nessafaḍ yiwen seg wudmawen imeqqranen n tẓuri tazzayrit ay d-yeǧǧan tadsilt-nnes ɣer yidis n waṭas n yinaẓuren n tsuta tamezwarut deg Zzayer tamzarugt, deg umezruy n umezgun, n tliẓrit d tegsarut tazzayrit », ɣef wakken ay d-yerna.
« Acḥal ay teqqim tnaẓurt-a d tamudemt yernu d aɣerbaz i wacḥal n tsutiwin n yinaẓuren, d ayen ay tt-yeǧǧan tuklal azrak n ugdud-nnes yeqqimen tettḍafar-itt s tekdit. ‘Lalla Ɛini’ tella d tanaẓurt yesɛan aswir agraɣlan », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna uselway Tebboune.
« Ala akennu ara neknu i tmeɣsiwt n Yuc Akmeḍni. Nekk yeggra-iyi-d kan ad ɛezziɣ s wul yenneɣnan, tawacult tadelsant, tin n yinaẓuren s umata d yiqriben n tmeṛḥumt s lxuṣuṣ, yernu ad ttreɣ Yuc ad yessers iɣsan n tmeṛḥumt-a deg tmella-nnes tuqdist, ad tt-yemmager deg temsunt-nnes tawesɛant yernu ad d-yazen taẓidirt d lwens i wayt twacult-nnes. Nekkni n Yuc yernu ɣer-s ara neqqel », ɣef wakken ay tt-id-yextem uselway n tegduda.

Maykl Djaksun
Maykl Juzif Djaksun ilul ɣ Ɣuct 1958 ɣ Gari (tawankt n Wandyana) immut assf n 25 Yunyu 2009 ɣ Lus Anjlus (tawankt n Kalifurnya) iga anaẓuṛ Amirikani, amsiys d umarir d unḍḍam, ar fllas ttinin "Agllid n Upup" acku ilkm ɣaylli jju ur ilkim kra n umarir yaḍni ɣ ubdar d tsusnt d tmsaɣt n tassfifin, tsul tzzigizt nns kkuẓt n tmrawin n isggʷasn.[1]

Asuɣel ɣer Tmaziɣt : El Morabet Abdelilah
Zi taɣzuyt ɣar Villa Sanjurjo: Udmawen d inagan n temdint n Mass Ɛabdelḥamid Rrayes.
“Llqeb n Bu Lḥaḍara“
–
“… ad yili ɣir ijjen umeddukel ttlaɣan-as “AL-INSAN” d netta i dayi-iggin lleqeb n BU LḤAḌARA, uca izzuzzar jar imeddukal imaḥḍaren, dewleɣ ttwassneɣ zag-s ktar zeg isem-inu, “AL-INSAN ” iḍelq-it xafi, laḥeqqac tiggʷdi- inu spisyal di tɣuri d tudert, am :
Imeddukal-inu marra ttkemman, necc lla, maca zellgeɣ-asen igarruten.
Lebda aqqa-ayi deg iseqsiyen d ufesser i waṭṭas n isental, tussna, falsafa d tsekla.
Tuɣa-ayi ttwaẓlayeɣ (spécialist) deg ucceddi n kurbaṭat (cravates), fsuseɣ, ccḍareɣ…
Aṭṭas n imaḥḍaren ttettaren zag-i ad asen-tt-qqneɣ x yiri…
Ict twalat tuɣa-ayi di tḥanut taspanyut, xseɣ ad sɣeɣ ca n leḥwayj, msagareɣ dinni aked rebɛa n Ispunya fqiqqsen deg ucceddi n kurbaṭat, walu, ur zemmaren… nniɣ-asen: « ucem-ayi-d, ad awem-ɛedleɣ acceddi »
Xezzaren deg wayawya s usfixex…
Issiɣ-ayi-t-id ijjen zag-sen, deg umcan ɛedleɣ-tt… uca wtin-ayi tacarrift .
Rni x manawya, necc ttuɣa itteɛjib-ayi ad yerḍeɣ mliḥ d tazdugi n warruḏ.
Mamec ma yella lḥal, ttuɣa ussan n Lmeɛhed Ddini, ussan sebḥen, cnan di temdint n VILLA SANJURJO (AL-HOCEIMA) ufiɣ-t d ict tudimt n tussna d uxarres di tudert, dinni i lemdeɣ tilelli, ktar axmi ttmuniɣ aked imeḥḍaren imɣaren xaf-i, uca ufiɣ ixf-inu di lwesṭ n iɣuyyan n waydud…”
Ttwaksen-d zi tudemt 394 n udlis : AL-HOCEIMA
ZI TAƔZUYT ƔAR VILLA SANJURJO.
Udmawen d inagan n tamdint.
Mass Abdelhamid RAÏS.

Nasa tiweḍ deg wass n lexmis 18 Febrayer ad tessers rrubu n n « Perseverance» (amkabar) x Mares. D rrubu wis xemsa i yewwḍen ad isafar bla ma ad din yili ca n wemxumbel. Maca awettas amezwaru i yeggin ḥuma ad afen, deg iseggusa i d-igguren. Ca n tmitar n tudert d taqdimt x watri-ya azeggaɣ. « Hekku idettet »
... (324 chars skipped) ... 
eḍ, akid-s tnayen n ifuṭuten,isewwar-iten-d urubu-nni deg wemkan-nni mani ieḍra. « Azul a ddunect. Ha lxezrat-inu tamezwarut x taddart i ɣa yilin inu i lebda ». D tanita d ttwit i tegga Nasa, akid-s tnayen n ifuṭuten s ucemlal d uberkan, nettwala akid-sen ula d tili n rrubu x ucal.
Arrayes n Umarikan Joe Biden iḥeyya hekku « amezruyan », iwekked x « tnezmart n tussna » d « tiɣist n Imarikaniyen ». Lxedmet-a i tegga Nasa, tɣasṭar x-as ca n 2.5 melyar dular. Xsen ad d-rren x ijjen useqsi : Ma ad d
... (324 chars skipped) ...
 zi tazzla n 20000 km/h ɣer tazzla n ziru.
« D ijjen lxedmet n gruppu tecna s waṭṭas, neccin nettɛeffar zzag-s. Manaya i nettedder akidwem d teycatin snehzzant wul ». D manaya ig inna Emmanuel Macron, i tseḍma n Cnes i tuɣa i njemɛen di Paris. D nitni zyenfan wami wwḍen ɣer min xsen.
Rrubu n Perserverance yiwwi akid-s ijjen kamira qqaren-as SuperCam. D ijjen yimis Afranku-mirikan i yettwaxdmen di CNRS d CNES di lxedmet-a ta.

Tagrut-agi (découverte) n 2017, tessembawel timussniwin. Iguraz ilsanen (restes humains) i d-sskeflen deg utaram n Amurakuc swexxren s 100 000 n yiseggasen ubani n telmest-nneɣ (espèce) : ad tuɣal sya d asawen tesɛa 300 000 n yiseggasen.
Semmus n yiterrasen, kraḍ imengaḍen (adultes), anubi (adolescent) d ugrud n ṣa ar ṭam iseggasen i d-sskeflen. Drus deg-sen, maca ssembawlen timussniwin ɣef umezruy n yirgazen imezwura. Mačči d tifin n yiɣsan-nsen, i d-sskeflen deg udrar Iɣud – Lmerruk (Jebel Irh
... (252 chars skipped) ... 
 maḍi n urgaz atrar (Homo sapiens) yettwassnen.
Ulac deg-s ccek : aqadum n « Iɣud 10 » yiwen deg semmus n yiterrasen i d-ufan deg wadeg amerruki, ibeggen-d belli mačči d argaz amezwaru yessqedcen times (Homo erectus) u mačči d argaz amezwaru i iɛacen deg Tuṛuft d Asya (Néandertalien), maca d argaz atrar (Homo sapiens).
Adeg n udrar Iɣud, ufan-t i tikkelt tamezwarut deg 1961. Llant deg-s aṭas n yidrizen (traces) n useqdec n tmes. Ixefawen n yifecka yerɣan, fkan-d tagnit i yimussnawen i wakken ad 
... (252 chars skipped) ...
qt. Ayagi ibeggen-d afraq n telmest deg yiwet n tallit ɣef yal umenẓaw (continent) n tefriqt.
Tagrut-agi tameqrant n umnadi deg temhazt talsant (paléoanthropologue) Jean-Jacques Hublin akked d terbaɛt-is, teffeɣ-d deg tesɣunt n tussna « Nature » ass n 07 yunyu 2017.

Scipione del Ferro (6 brayeṛ 1465 - 5 nuwambir 1526), ikka-t-inn iga yan umusnak awṭalyan, d umusnak akkʷ izwuren s tɣarast nna s da iferru yan tagda "cubic".
Ilul-d Scipione del Ferro g Bulunya, agafa n Ṭṭalyan, iga memmi-s n Floriano d Filippa Ferro. Baba-s Floriano, iswuri yad g temguri n walkaɣiṭ, iger amguran nna mi tettuɣul tilit-nnes ɣer usnulfu n tsiggezt g temrawant n yid 1450, ayedda yujjan Scipione ad yili asadef s mennawt twuriwin seg mayd imeẓẓi. Iwwel yat tmeṭṭut yaru id-s yat terb
... (22 chars skipped) ... 
Filippa, ɣef yemma-s nettat.
Irwas is d taɣiwant n Bulunya ad d-ikka, mani g ittyasay amm yan iggaren tiɣuriwin g "Arithmetic" akked "Geometry" aseggʷas n1496. Iseggʷasen-nnes ineggura, izzri-ten da iswuri g yiger n umseɣsenzi.
Meqqar d yan warra seg dar del Ferro ur inejjim. Da tetturruy tamentilt-ad s umata-nnes ɣer tagʷit-nnes i umsawaḍ ɣef twuriwin-nnes. G udɣar n ad d-ifser tiwengimin-nnes, da tent-immal ɣas i yat tufrint imeẓẓin g yimeddukkal d yinelmaden-nnes.
Tella turda n mas d-ikka uya
... (22 chars skipped) ...
snaken n tizi-ann g t-nn-kkan da tteggan "challenges" gratsen mnid n umata. kudenna idegga yan umusnak s "challenge" n wayya, da ittili ɣef ku yan gi-sen ad ifru tamukrist n wayyaḍ. G kigan n tikkal, da itterzu "Perdant" n "challenge" g usidrem (financement) neɣ d ansa-nnes ammas n tɣiwant. Ikka-t-nn Del Ferro da ittiksaḍ ad "être challenge" d irwas is d imk-ann a'ɣef yujja twuri-nnes akkʷ ixatren tga tuffirt afad ad si-s isten iɣef-nnes kudenna nn-yufa agayyu-nnes g tuẓẓumt n kra n "challenge".

Volume 14, Numéro 1, Pages 105-122
2022-12-31
Auteurs : Sadi Nabila .
Résumé La présente étude se consacre à l’analyse de la préface des romans écrits en langue kabyle. La préface est ce discours d’escorte qui accompagne la publication de l’œuvre littéraire. Elle joue d’ordinaire la fonction de médiation entre auteur et lecteur en fournissant à ce dernier une certaine manière de lire et d’apprécier l’œuvre qu’elle commente. Néanmoins, il arrive souvent qu’elle outrepasse cette fonc
... (481 chars skipped) ... 
ylit. Tazwert, d inaw i d-issenkaden aḍris aseklan. Tettili di tazwara n uḍris xas ulama tḥaz fell-as. Di tuget, tazwert, tekkat amek ara d-tessebgen i umeɣri amek i ilaq ad iɣer d wamek i ilaq ad yegzu aḍris i d-tessenkad. Maca, tezmer ad teffel twuri n tezwert i waya i wakken ad d-tger assaɣen gar uḍris d wayen yura meṛṛa umaru, neɣ gar uḍris d tallit i-deg yettwaru uḍris. Di tezrawt-agi, ad neereḍ ad nesleḍ azal n eecrin n tezwarin akken ad nwali amek i tettbeddil talɣa d ugbur-nsent ilmend n
... (481 chars skipped) ...
other types of mediation: with the complete work of the author, with the context in which the work was written, etc. This is why this study will show, by analysing about twenty prefaces, how the forms and the stakes of this prefaces evolved according to the evolution of t the Kabyle literary field and the positions assumed by the prefacers within this same field.

Manis i dd-tekka tyaẓiḍt ? Zi tmellalt!
I manis i dd-tekka tmellalt? zi tyaẓiḍt !
I wi dd-izguren? D tyaẓiḍt niɣ tamellalt ?
Asqsi-ya zi temẓi neccin nettirar zeg-s jar-aneɣ, maca ɛemmars ma negga ca n trezzut, a nexzar min nnan imassanen di manaya, d mamek rrin x useqsi-ya.
Di cutembir 2018, deg yijjen trezzut ggin-tt imussnawen n ufizik di tseddawit n Kwinzland d usinag n Nyil di Ustralya, nnan belli « Quantum physics » teqqar tiwed ɣer:
« Tyaẓiḍt d tmellalt ta wer dd-tezgur i tenneɣni. » Tadukturt Jaki Rumiru tenna di trezzut-a i tefsar tseddawit: « Quantum physics tejja-neɣ a nxarreṣ ɣer beṛṛa i tmeslayt n » cause and effect » i zi ttuɣa ttemsawalen ifaylasufen n Grik di tmukrist‑a n wi dd-yezguren » Tuca ijjen umedya s bnadm-nni ittraḥen ɣer lxedmet s ṭṭubis, zi sseni iṭṭara zeg uṭubis, innay di lkar. Quantum physics teqqar manaya izemmar ad yili deg yijjen wakud (the theory of relativity n Einshtein). Manaya maṛṛa ɛlaḥsab Quantum physics.
Deg yijjen trezzut nniḍen tegga-tt tseddawit n Sheffield d tseddawit n Warwick, ufin belli d tyaẓiḍt i dd-yezguren, Minzi tamellalt tsennad deg usmutteg‑nnes x yijjen uprutin qqaren-as OC-17, aklasi‑ya n uprutin war ittili illa di lwalda (ovary) n tyaẓiḍt, manaya iqqar belli war tzemmar ad tili yijjen ḥajet qqaren-as tamellalt illa mala ttuɣa-tt di lwalda n tyaẓiḍt.
Yura‑t Anir Maziɣ

Lḥusin At Ḥmed ilul ass n 20 ɣuct 1926, deg taddart n At Ḥmed, deg tɣiwant n At Yaḥya, yemmut ass n 23 di duğember 2015 deg Lausanne (Swiss).
Yennuɣ mgal acengu aṛṛumi, seg asmi yesea 15 iseggasen deg tudert-is, yella deg umussu n uɣref azzayri, syin yuɣal d netta id aqerru fell-asen.
Tudsa tusligt (O.S), i yesbedd anda i yuɣal d aqerru mi i yemmut Muḥemed Belwezdad. Yettiki ger 9 n lqeyad n tirni n uslelli aɣelnaw (FLN). Asmi id wwi lezzayer timunent yedra-d lxilaf gar-is d Ben Bella d ayen it yessawden ad yesbedd tirni iɣalen inemlayen i yessuturen tugdut deg tmurt. Ayen it yessawden ad yekcem ɣer lḥebs deg 1964 imi yerfed leslaḥ mgal adabu amesbatli di tmurt n leqbayel. Yuɣal-d ɣer tmurt seld ccwal d imenɣi n 1988, acku ieawed yerwel ɣer Swis imi i nɣan Asselway Muḥamed Budyaf.
Tandelt-is deg taddart-is tella taɣarfant. Yugi ad yemdel deg tmeqbert n lealya yeqqim di tmengla ula di lmut-is.

Amdal aserɣin
Amdal aserɣin neɣ Amdal aɛrab (s Tserɣint: الوطن العربي , al-waṭan al-ʿarabī) d irem arakal-aserti yettwafken i yiwet n temnaṭ yezdin deg umezruy d yidles d tutlayt, Amdal aserɣin d tamnaṭ yeddan seg ugaraw anaṭlas deg umalu ar yilel aserɣin d ubagu n Faris deg usamar, s wakka yezdi yakk timura yellan d igmanen deg temɣunt Taserɣint deg umalu n Asya d Tefrikt n ugafa d usamar-is, Amdal aserɣin d win yettawin daɣen kra n tamiwin yettwaṭṭfen am seg kra n tmura ur nelli ara d tiserɣinin am Falestin d ugni n Gulan d Senjaq n Alexandrit d tamiwin tigafanin n Surya id tefka Fransa i Turkya d Tigzirin Tiknariyin d Sebta d Mlilt d tegzirt n iceffaren (yettwaṭṭfen s ɣur Spanya) d Ahwaz d kra n tegzirin n Emarat yettwaṭṭfen sɣur Iran
Deg wakud dgi Iserɣinen ssexdamen iren n Tmurt taserɣint, Timura n Uruppa d Iwunak Yedduklen n Marikan d waṭas n tmura n iden ssexdamen irem n Asamar alemmas d Tefriqt n ugafa i wakken ad sseɣlin fell-as aglam n timserɣent i wakken ad sdukklen-t dges tamurt n Israyel d aɣref n ikurdiyen

Tineggura-a, anida tezzi tiṭ-ik ama deg yiberdan neɣ deg yimukan-nniḍen, ala tiqerɛatin d tebwaḍin n uplastik ara d-temlileḍ. Ulac tardast deg wakal n tmurt, ur tḥuza ara taluft-agi n yiḍuman n uplastik. Win iwumi tenniḍ, ad ak-yini : « Mačči d nekk ara d-iqeɛden tamurt ! ». Yal wa yettara-d ṭṭlam ɣef wayeḍ ; imezdaɣ qqaren-d d tiɣiwanin ur nxeddem ara axeddim-nsent, nutenti si tama-nsent, ur sawḍent ara ɣer lebɣi-nsent, yerna seḍlament imezdaɣ. lastik. D tigawt taɣelnawt iwumi semman « Aggur War Aplastik ». Tebda, ass n 21 cutember yezrin, ad tkemmel alamma d ass-a n, 21 tuber 2019. Ad d-yili uḍfar n tigawt-a taɣelnawt, sɣur teseqqamut n uḍfar d uktazel, yetabaɛen ɣer uɣlif n twennaḍt. Am wakken, i ssawḍen ad d-suddsen azal n 69 n yisaragen d yimyaggren deg yakk timnaḍin n tmurt, i usefhem i medden ɣef wazal d wamek ilaq ɣef umdan ad iseḥbiber ɣef ugama d twennaḍt. d wallus n usseqdec n wafrasen.I lmend n waya, daɣ deg lwilaya n Ǧiǧel d Ɛennaba, nulfan-d kra n tkebbaniyin i lmend n ulqaḍ n yiḍuman n uplastik, ara d-ixelqen ama d imekwan n uxeddim, ama d asizdeg n twennaḍt. Am wakken daɣen i d-heggan ticemliyin n uqɛad n kra n yimukan deg kra n lwilayat n unẓul n tmurt i wakken ad d-yili wallus n useqdec n wafrasen n uplastik, yernu iger-d uɣlif n twennaḍt tiɣri i yimdanen terza temsalt akken ad sseftin deg uḥric-agi i d-isekcamen idrimen.

Deg tnewwalt n leqbayel
Tikerciwin
Isufar
2 Kg n tkerciwin ( dewwara)
2 n tyiggar n zrudiya
2 n tyiggar n texsayt ( tifeqlujin timectaḥ)
1 n tebṣelt
1 n tɣenjawt n tumatic yerkin
4 n tfednan n ticcert

Lmaɛdnus
Lmelḥ ( tisent )
Lqerfa , ifelfel aberkan ….
Takemmict n yiḥemmuẓen
Aheggi
Sired dewwara ( tikerciwin ) akken issefk ( s waman izeqqalen ), err-itent , ad uddument , gzem-itent d iftaten imectaḥ, ad uɣalent ɣef tmes ad awlent. Seqcer tidal ( legumes ) , sired–itent , gzem-iten , err-itent ɣer tuggi ( taccuyt) ad qlunt . S yin ɣer-s , Ales , suddem tikerciwin –nni yewwlen , semlil-itent nutenti d tidal , rnu ɣer-sent tuga ( lekrafez, lemɛadnus ittwagezmen . ), zuzzer-asent ifelfel aberkan , lqerfa , akked yiwet n tɣenjawt n tumatic yerkin . Rnu–asent 2 n litrat n waman yewwlen ( iḥman) , terred-asent ad wwent . S tezmert-nnwen(t) .
S ɣur Daya

Seg yimiren, ttdumun deg uselmed n yimceggɛen, di lemxalta, di beṭṭu n uɣrum akked tẓallit. Lecɣal 2.42
Aṭas n lɣaci i yellan ur fhimen ara akken ilaq d acu i d tamezdayt Ԑisa Lmasiḥ. Awal n « Ecclesia » i d-ikkan si tutlay tayunanit, iwumi neqqar s tutlayt-nneɣ « Tamezdayt » ur yebɣi ara ad d-yini d lebni neɣ d axxam, lameena d anejmue n lɣaci i d-ittusawlen a d-ffɣen si, neɣ » i d-ittwaxtaren, uɣalen di rrif ». Ssira yifen akk tiyaḍ iwakken ad tfehmem akken ilaq tteṣwira n tidet n Tmezdayt amek i tella, d Tira Iqedsen; ddmet-tt-id ad tt-teɣrem iwakken ad tt-walim deg-s lemqsud n Yillu, ayen i d-ihegga di lebɣi-s i wid i yumnen s Ԑisa Lmasiḥ, nutni yellan d tamezdayt n ṣṣeḥ. Di temsirin agi, ad nelmed ɣef wayen yeenan isaka agi :
Timsirin:
- Amek i d-tlul Tmezdayt.
- Tteswirat i d-netteddem iwakken a d-nessefhem amek i texdem Tmezdayt, d acu-tt.
- Lumur neɣ leqwanen n Tmezdayt.
- Wid ittwellihen di Tmezdayt.
- Anejmae ameqran amezwaru n Tmezdayt.

Deg iseggasen agi ineggura ulac ass ur nettali war ma yegla-d s isalan n yiwen neY n yiwet inYan iman-is deg tmurt nneY. Tamnaṭ n Bgayet, Tizi wezzu d Tubiret, ṭṭfent taqacuct deg leḥsabat n wuṭṭunen n wid i ttqeṭṭin deg iman-nsen.
Tuget d ilmeẓyen d tlemeẓyin n ddaw 30 iseggasen. Maca ayen yessewhamen akken annect-agi iḍerru-d, yerna ula d yiwen ur d iclig. Amzun akken d izan i iYellin mačči d imdanen.
Imḍebbren n tmurt d uɣlif n tezmert ur t-id-iggir ara akk deg leḥsab. Ur gin ara kra n usenfa
... (216 chars skipped) ... 
gnit-nni ur ssawḍen ara imdanen ad nnYen iman-nsen am akken tḍeṛṛu deg Jappu (Japan). Ass n wass-a newweḍ ar yiwet n teggnit nniḍen, ideg ulac yiwen ur nessin ara xerṣum yiwen inYan iman-is.
Tifukal ugtent, yal wa acu i ihedder. D acu kan deg tmura i yesean iYeblan-agi, deg tezrawin i gan ɣef tfukal-agi, ufan d tujjya i s-ilaqen. Iɣawasen n uwelleh, ttwaxedmen. Yal amdan deg Uwanek akked tmeti fkan-d afus deg uwelleh d tmusni ɣef taluft-agi.
Deg tmurt n Lezzayer, anager inaw n ddin i s-ttarran i
... (216 chars skipped) ...
kken wid ineqqen akka imann-nsen tgen akk leḥsabat-agi?!!
Ass-a n wussan, yewweḍ-d wakud akken ad ffYen imdanen seg wekraf-agi i ten-yuYen qeccuc meccuc akken ad eerḍen ad gen kra. Yal yiwen ahat izmer ad yefk tazmert-is. Tiddukliwin tewwi-d ad d-lhunt d taluft-agi. Imusnawen ad megren tamusni-nsen, ad tt-fken i wigi. Ma yella aǧeǧǧiḍ ineṭteḍ ula d layas. Ticki yegma yettbuebun, ineṭṭeḍ. Acu xas akken asirem daYen ineṭteḍ, ma yella nerra-t d netta i d iswi-nneY deg tuddar d iYerman n tmurt-nneY.

Nɣunza abrid i tikli, aḍar yettagad uguren. Neckenteḍ deg lekdeb, d targit i d-yewwi yiḍ asmi yes-sen i aɣ-zuznen. Tidett neguma ad tt-nqabel, nugi ɣur-s ad nezzi, nna-aɣ-d qqarriḥet!
D amcum i la irebḥen, ara irebḥen, acku ur yeksib leḥya, zur wudem-is; udem-nni yesared s isaɣwen. D mmis n laṣel ara ixeṣren acku ur yessin i txeṣart, ur iqebbel leɣlaḍ.
Amennuɣ ɣef tidett ad iḍul, ad yiwɛir. Maca ur yelli d awezɣi neɣ d ayen ara yarzen ifadden, ara yerẓen iɣallen i wemdan.
Di tizi-k ay ass-a, ur d-yegri win izemren ad aɣ-yesdukkel! Win id d-yufraren ad tesimsen, win yumsen s wannect-nni ara teṭfen, s wannect-nni ara teqnen.
Iqbayliyen ( isertanen ) gran-d di tinna: “ Inni-d leɛyub-iw ad inniɣ wid-inek!” Dɣa din ara d-ters tsusmi ɣef yimi, ad tekbel tidett-nni.
Agdud aqbayli, ur as-d-yegri umḍarkel, ur yelli wembiwel. Ur yezmir ad yeddu melba win ara t-iseddun, ur yumin ara belli yezmer ad yekker s yiman-is ɣef yiman-is, i yiman-is, ad yanef i iɣeblan-is, lejruḥ-is akked yir wussan-is, ad meslayen s yisem-is. Yezmer ad tbeddel tegnitt i deg i tesemrarɣen; tagnitt i t-yeggunin, yir tagnitt id as-d-yegran. Agdud itettu, ur yeẓri ara tazmert i yekseb.
Snulfan-aɣ-d aɛdaw ur nessin, d laxyal id aɣ-yuɣal, yal ass yid-s nettnaɣ. S wuffal i aɣ-d-fkan, mi i aɣ-weṣan yes-s ad t-newwet.
Ɣef wayla-nneɣ nezzi allen, tamuɣli terra s ayla n ibaraniyen. Nger yečča-d amnar, yettqaraɛ ṭbel melmi ara as-nebru deg waman.
Irnaten Murad

Wp/shi/Musa
Musa (s taeibrit: מֹשֶׁה Moce Mošé, s teerabt: موسى, Mūsā), iga yan ɣ mmis niɣd nbi yan ɣ immisn, yackat tigira ns Eisa d Muḥmmad, yawid yan udllis lli mmu nttini tawrat. Inna mast id izzukz Rbbi f uɣrf n ait israyil. Tga tadyant ns yat ɣ tidyanin tiqburin lli mmu nttini Tudayt. Imtfrn n Musa llan ɣ kraygat tasga n umaḍal. Mac yan ugzzum gitsn ira ad yurri s tmazirt tamzwarut n Musa lli igan Israil d Filisṭin.

Wp/shi/Muritanya
- Iɣ ur igi ɣwad amgrad nna tsiggilt, kcm s tasna n Muritanya bac ad tẓrt akk imgradn nna dar illa yism zund ɣwa !
Tga Muritanya yat tmazirt. Ism nns unṣib iga t Tagduda tamuslmt n Muritanya.
Tga Muritanya yan wansa n unyalkam ngr ifriqya n iẓẓlmḍ d tin ddu tnzruft.
Ism[edit | edit source]
Ittyassan d tigira ad ɣ dar wida ittaran s tmaziɣt ism n "muritan".
Ibdr muḥmmad cafiq ɣ umawal nns imqqurn ismawn n aggawj d agawc i tmazirt n muritanya. ɣ umawal nns daɣ, amuritaniy iga t agadj, d umagut nns iga t igudajn. ur nssin mani ɣ d yiwy tiguriwin ad. ẓḍarn ad gin zɣ dar imuzaɣ.
Tettyawssan muritanya zikk d ula ɣilad s yism n blad cngiṭ.

tlla yat trabbut ɣ fisbuk skrn tt kra imaziɣn n muritanya ar git sawaln f tmaziɣt nnsn. ism nns d ulink nns iga tn اكلام آۯﻧﺎﮔﻪ.
